quote: Apollo 13, one of the most exciting adventure movies of the year, proves that science history can be just as thrilling as science fiction.

quote: Howard is not above pushing buttons of his own and milking the big moments. But they are indeed big moments, and the manipulation is not intrusive. He has made a can-do movie for our can't-do age.
title: Apollo 13

quote: The film, despite its raggedness, is stirring. In the end, this failed mission seems like the most impressive achievement of the entire space program: a triumph not of planning but of inspired improvisation.
title: Apollo 13

quote: This meticulous but ultimately rather pedestrian drama gradually won me over as a minor if watchable example of the "victory through defeat" brand of military heroism that John Ford specialized in.
title: Apollo 13

quote: Self-conscious about its heroism with portrayals that lean toward the glib and the professionally uplifting, the film milks our sympathies too readily to be emotionally convincing.
title: Apollo 13

quote: This engrossing account of the nation's most perilous moon shot embodies what many people consider to be old-fashioned American virtues in a virtually pristine state.
title: Apollo 13

quote: Apollo 13, Ron Howard's soaring salute to space exploration, lifts off with a payload of the right stuff-courage, can-do, grace under pressure and other qualities derided as machismo by some and applauded as old-fashioned values by others.

quote: Major, rousing, thoroughly professional Hollywood entertainment that will dazzle you with its re-creations of historical events, take you inside the space capsule and the Houston command center, and leave you wondering where our heroes [have gone].
title: Apollo 13

quote: For a 'space movie', both the special effects and photography are surprisingly pedestrian. Where it scores is in subtly restating traditional notions of male heroism.
title: Apollo 13

quote: Playing the tough, commanding Jim Lovell is a substantial stretch for Mr. Hanks, but as usual his seeming ingenuousness overshadows all else about the role. There's not a false move to anything he does on screen.

quote: If you thought Tom Hanks was just an ordinary big-screen star, wait until you've seen him eight stories tall.
title: Apollo 13

quote: The special effects and many scenes of weightlessness look as good or better than in the original, while the Oscar-winning sound and James Horner's rousing score make good use of the hefty audio system.
title: Apollo 13

title: Apollo 13

quote: Blowing up some 35mm films to an image 10 times larger could magnify their plot faults and performance shortcomings. But Apollo 13, with its taut cast, script and direction, profits from the process.
title: Apollo 13

quote: Rob Roy has its diversions, but they are unfortunately outweighed by some heavy baggage that contains not enough of substance.

title: Rob Roy

title: Rob Roy

quote: With such a cast and the setting of the Highlands, plus a story with a gold mine of dramatic potential, it is a puzzle why Rob Roy is so uninvolving.
title: Rob Roy

quote: You always know where it's going even as it meanders for two and a half hours getting there.
title: Rob Roy

quote: No more than moderately satisfying.
title: Rob Roy

quote: Strange. I thought I had seen enough sword fights in movies to last a lifetime, but I was wrong.

quote: If you're in a forgiving, campy frame of mind (which I must have been the night I saw this), there's cheap pleasure to be gained from the experience.

quote: Stupefyingly lackluster.

quote: Despite all the heavy breathing and mood lighting, Basic Instinct 2 is so dull that you might find yourself easily distracted by side issues.

title: Basic Instinct 2

quote: This film is unable to involve, entertain, or titillate. Basically, it stinks.
title: Basic Instinct 2

quote: Stone's purring, snarling, bedroom kink is embarrassing.

quote: But the movie is a baroque little mystery of so little mystery or consequence that you're literally sitting there waiting for the next full body cavity search.
title: Basic Instinct 2

quote: At this point, there are inflatable toys that are livelier than Stone, but how can you tell the difference? Basic Instinct 2 is not an erotic thriller. It's taxidermy.

quote: Using the same basic plot as 1992's original, BI2 feels less like a sequel than a remake whose shelf life has expired.

quote: This loud and boisterous comic book confidential is serviceable enough to satisfy.

quote: Kilmer's good, not surprisingly, but he doesn't get to do a lot.

quote: Bigger, battier and better.

quote: A grand- scale effort that's more awe-inspiring than completely successful as entertainment.

quote: An odd movie, brilliant in places, but frustrating all the same.

quote: It's a highly professional piece of Hollywood sentimentalism.

quote: [Let us] heartily proclaim that it is the freshest little picture in a long time, and maybe even the best comedy of this year.

quote: A clever and deeply original story, that remains true and confident in direction, while delivering considerable charm all the while.
title: Miracle on 34th Street

quote: The movie is expert on how cars are stolen (it takes about 10 seconds). It is also expert on how a smart and essentially prudent kid ends up inside a lot of stolen cars and gets into a lot of trouble.

quote: The movie is enlightening, not because it transmits new information, but in the way that movies enlighten, through a synergy of images and rhythms that makes us sense the world in a new way.

quote: As a satirist, [Stone's] an elephant ballerina.

quote: This is one of my all time favorite movies, and it put Oliver Stone on my list of 'Best Directors Ever,' right along with Stanley [Kubrick].

quote: Welcome to Natural Born Killers, Stone's empty, manic meditation on society's glorification of violence and the ugly heroes it loves to hate.

quote: Seeing this movie once is not enough. The first time is for the visceral experience, the second time is for the meaning.

quote: The main problem with Killers...is that it degenerates into the very thing it criticizes.

quote: Even so, the ravishing visuals, some swooning love songs, and the strains of Verdi should see you through to the predictably moist ending.

quote: A gritty, powerful first feature by Lee Tamahori.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: The howling raging energy of the prize-winning New Zealand film Once Were Warriors rushes at you, hits you like a smack in the face.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: The violence in Once Were Warriors (Fine Line, R), a tumultuous domestic drama from New Zealand, erupts with terrifying suddenness.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: The barren lives of members of an urban Maori family are rigorously exposed in this rugged and painful picture, based on Alan Duff's novel.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: The urban Maori milieu, however, is something we haven't seen before, and the images stay with you.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: A gritty human drama evoking the residual vibrancy of a threatened culture.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: Left floundering in an inhospitable urban world, they have lost touch with their tribal past to become part of a rootless global subculture. The misery seen here would be familiar anywhere.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: A gut-grabber from New Zealand ... that stays with you for days.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: As often happens when films are intent on getting a message across, Once Were Warriors can't stop itself from overdoing things.

quote: Works, to some degree, on three levels: the visceral, the emotional, and the intellectual, and it is the amalgamation of these that makes this a memorable film.

quote: It is powerful and chilling, and directed by Lee Tamahori with such narrative momentum that we are swept along in the enveloping tragedy of the family's life.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: Yet familiar as the pattern is ... the film holds because of the acting and because it functions as travelogue.
title: Once Were Warriors

quote: The actors, many of them of European-Maori descent, are wonderful to look at. They also deliver authoritative yet sympathetic performances that get at the roots, or rootlessness, of their characters.

quote: Reserve judgment until this raw, uncompromising working-class saga is over, and you might find yourself unforgettably moved -- and grateful for the experience.

quote: If a person spends enough time looking serious, sounding defiant and staring intently at computer screens, all will be well with the world.

quote: An absolute hoot.
title: Outbreak

quote: Displays all the initial symptoms of a promising thriller, it soon degenerates into a low-fever whodunit.
title: Outbreak

quote: No one likes to be teased, but that's exactly what this movie does to us, with predictably frustrating results.
title: Outbreak

quote: One of the great scare stories of our time.
title: Outbreak

quote: Comes off as a shrill, self-important bore.
title: Outbreak

quote: A clunky thriller.
title: Outbreak

quote: A big, bustling, intermittently dippy melodrama.
title: Outbreak

quote: This is a picture good enough to make you want to go to the movies and frightening enough to make you wonder if you should avoid the crowds.
title: Outbreak

quote: Outbreak is pretty strong stuff.

quote: The movie sometimes bends the plausible to set up a laugh, and most of the time I didn't care, because I was enjoying the company of the characters.

quote: The cast is fine, the direction fluid, but the story wears you down.

quote: Reservoir Dogs still looks like the great American film of the decade, but Quentin Tarantino's second film as writer-director shows him already deep in the territory of self-parody.

quote: It resurrects John Travolta from "Look Who's Talking" hell, it makes Bruce Willis into a serious actor and it honors the power and fancy of intelligent dialogue (written by the director himself).

quote: Unmissable.

quote: This movie gets its charge not from action pyrotechnics but from its electric barrage of language, wisecracks and dialogue, from the mordant '70s classicism of its long-take camera style and its smart, offbeat, strangely sexy cast.

quote: The result, especially in the scenes involving Bruce Willis as a nervy boxer, can be long patches of dialogue that must have tickled Tarantino but will not necessarily resonate for anyone else.

quote: The talk is dirty and funny, the violence always waiting just around the corner.
title: Pulp Fiction

quote: Whether you call it razzmatazz, pizazz or sizzle, Pulp Fiction's got it, enough style for a dozen movies and, truth be told, enough story for five.

quote: In terms of mood and style, it could be the most influential film to come along since Blue Velvet.

quote: If you smile at David Mamet's dialogue, you'll laugh out loud at the words of Quentin Tarantino.

quote: Quiz Show is superbly shot (by Michael Ballhaus), and the acting ensemble could hardly be better.

title: Home Alone

quote: A lot of Hughes' hooray-for-suburban-misfits sensibility survives the milling process.
title: Home Alone

quote: [The movie has] an inconsistency of mood not helped by abrupt editing and Columbus' sometimes self-conscious direction.
title: Home Alone

quote: [A] surprisingly charming film, which may be the first Christmas black comedy for children.
title: Home Alone

quote: This is a film which manages to capture some of the best qualities of Christmas in a surprisingly enjoyable format and will provide the whole family with large quantities of festive spirit.
title: Home Alone

quote: If Home Alone had limited itself to the things that might possibly happen to a forgotten 8-year-old, I think I would have liked it more.
title: Home Alone

quote: This holiday contender from John Hughes is too crass, too loud and too violent to be added blithely to Christmas viewing traditions. But it is funny.

quote: Chris Columbus's junky, rambunctiously funny Home Alone is every kid's anarchical wish come true.

quote: The movie devolves into an egregious Three Stooges painfest: We're meant to giggle and clap along with Kevin as the crooks get their heads singed with blowtorches and walk barefoot on glass.

quote: Rubin's script is a lethally effective tragicomic fantasy.
title: Ghost

quote: The movie's slogan is "Believe," not an unreasonable request. But even those who'd be happy to comply must get past Ghost's one casting jaw-dropper, a certain woolly-mindedness to its script and a production prettified to the point of stickiness.
title: Ghost

quote: What it offers, apart from the overblown special effects that seem inescapable in American movies, is an unusual and effective combination of swooning, morbid romance and screwball comedy.
title: Ghost

quote: The passion and poignancy of trying to communicate with the dead is well-exploited here. Moore has never been more fetching.
title: Ghost

quote: Given its obviously commercial aims, Ghost is remarkably appealing on a purely personal level. It is about how you deal with death.
title: Ghost

quote: Ghost is one part horror picture, one part comedy, one part love story, one part murder mystery and four parts entrancing.
title: Ghost

quote: A bad movie that a lot of people will like.
title: Ghost

quote: There's something offensive about the movie's chintzy view of death and the way it periodically flirts with promising conceits only to back away from them in as cowardly a manner as possible.
title: Ghost

quote: It sounds like a horror movie, but it's a romantic fairy tale. The scariest thing about it is its shamelessness.
title: Ghost

quote: Ghost is a dazzlingly enjoyable pop thriller.
title: Ghost

quote: Ghost is an odd creation -- at times nearly smothering in arty somberness, at others veering into good, wacky fun.
title: Ghost

quote: A comedy, romance and supernatural thriller rolled into one, Ghost is a zippy pastiche that somehow manages to seem fresh even though it's built entirely out of borrowed parts.
title: Ghost

quote: The real credit for turning a minor mystic romance into one of the most enjoyable movies of the year rests on an excellent script by Bruce Joel Rubin, and on the surprisingly sure direction of Jerry Zucker.
title: Ghost

quote: Ghost' is too slow moving at times, and a few of its special effects look incongruously silly, particularly those showing what happens to ghosts not as virtuous as Sam.
title: Ghost

quote: Zucker dutifully pushes all the buttons -- romance, thrills, laughs, tears -- that have been pushed before by more assured hands.
title: Ghost

quote: Contains some nice ideas, and occasionally, for whole moments at a time, succeeds in evoking the mysteries that it toys with.
title: Ghost

quote: Surprisingly entertaining.
title: Ghost

quote: The actors succeed quite nicely in unifying the movie's multiple personalities, its ricocheting screenplay.
title: Ghost

quote: The magical, the mystical, the mysterious -- all those powers that lurk within movies but are rarely tapped are unleashed in Disney's latest magnificent animation, Aladdin.

quote: Aladdin is a film of wonders. To see it is to be the smallest child, open-mouthed at the screen's sense of magic, as well as the most knowing adult, eager to laugh at some surprisingly sly humor.

title: Aladdin

quote: Aladdin is a marvel of the cartoonist's art.
title: Aladdin

quote: Disney's latest animated feature is a thoroughly satisfying musical-comedy romp.
title: Aladdin

quote: Forget about the lamp. Aladdin is all anyone could wish for in holiday entertainment.
title: Aladdin

quote: This hilariously hip and thoroughly gorgeous motion picture is nothing less than the crowning achievement -- so far -- of Disney's revitalized animation department.
title: Aladdin

quote: The results are fun and fast moving, but far from sublime.

quote: It juggles a '90s impudence with the old Disney swank and heart.

title: Aladdin

quote: Visually, it's a treat, a perfect marriage of hi-tech graphics and the traditional Disney virtue of strong characterisation and colour.

quote: So funny and scrappy you don't need to drag a kid along.
title: Aladdin

quote: There's a good chance you're going to enjoy Aladdin more than the children.
title: Aladdin

title: Aladdin

quote: Much of the humor comes courtesy of Williams, who deserves (but won't get) an Oscar nomination for his vocal versatility.

quote: A magic carpet ride, a flight aboard a supersonic little Persian steered by all the wishes that ever were.

quote: Those of you expecting the comfy family-sedan ride of Beauty and the Beast are in for a shock-the immensely enjoyable Aladdin roars off the Disney production line like the latest-model sports car.

quote: This time Mr. Heavy Metal is on the side of the good guys. Naturally, he isn't quite as much fun.

quote: Even though this movie was made nearly 30 years ago, almost nothing about it feels dated.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: "The Terminator 2" is movie-making on a massive scale, packed dense with spectacular touches that are too many to describe - escape scenes, helicopter stunts and huge explosions.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: It proves that crackingly fast entertainment doesn't have to be mindless, and it manages to do so, with an endearingly cheeky sense of humour.

quote: Best of all, though, the level of tension in the film is palpable because we can`t figure out how Arnold is going to terminate the Terminator.

quote: A pop epiphany, marking that commercially creative point where the power of Hollywood meets the purity of myth.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: Cameron has done an honourable and undoubtedly skilful job of tailoring his new film to the tastes of the times without too much sloppy compromise. He's made a science fiction film with verve, imagination and even a little wit.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: Terminator 2 does work viscerally, however, and with this kind of movie, that's really what counts. No problemo.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: The pathos of the film is the pathos of its leading character -- it is a magnificent machine, but a machine it remains.

quote: More elaborate than the original, but just as shrewdly put together, it cleverly combines the most successful elements of its predecessor with a number of new twists to produce one hell of a wild ride.

quote: The picture is full of spectacular action sequences and dazzling special effects, but the narrative doesn't have the snap of the original's: it's lumbering and monotonous, and it carries a heavy-handed anti-nuke message.

quote: Inside Terminator 2 beats a human heart. But its soul is that of a killer machine.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: Schwarzenegger is in impeccable deadpan form, milking his tough-guy image for all it's worth and getting laughs out of the Terminator's wooden parroting of slang ("No problemo" probably will be a catch-phrase to reckon with this summer).
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: Terminator 2 is a state-of-the-art action movie, all right: It gets you thinking that the most reasonable thing might just have been to blow everyone away.

quote: A humongous, visionary parable that intermittently enthralls and ultimately disappoints. T2 is half of a terrific movie -- the wrong half.
title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

quote: For all its state-of-the-art pyrotechnics and breathtaking thrills, this bruisingly exciting movie never loses sight of its humanity. That's its point, and its pride.

quote: Arnold Schwarzenegger is more comfortable and assured here than the first time around, reprising a role so perfectly suited to the voice and physique that have established him as a larger-than-life film persona.

quote: As a fancy mechanism fueled by the pleasure of watching legions of people and equipment being summarily destroyed, this is pretty hot stuff.

quote: Structured as a simple chase, the story sags midway, but the first hour and last 30 minutes display an enjoyably relentless bravura.

quote: Mr. Cameron has made a swift, exciting special-effects epic that thoroughly justifies its vast expense and greatly improves upon the first film's potent but rudimentary visual style.

quote: By never falling into the trap of allowing spectacle to supersede character, Costner's Dances with Wolves restores depth, idealism, poignancy and even wonder to a genre that had long seemed moribund.

quote: It's an engrossing tale, and Costner directs with the confidence of a Hollywood veteran well aware that entertainment comes before earnestness.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: This is a big picture in love with our landscape as much as with the Sioux Indians who inhabit it.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: The important issues raised by the film- centered on the cultural, racial and moral struggle that took place on the American frontier-are glossed over in favor of a juvenile fantasy of male bonding around the campfire.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: This collective array of talent has yielded a western that is at once original and traditional. Dances With Wolves looks back to the masterworks of the past and, with its relevance to our present, it deserves to be ranked with them.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: A slow-moving but well-acted western.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: Sincere, capable, at times moving, but overextended, this picture is seriously hampered by its tendency to linger over everything -- especially landscapes with silhouetted figures, and not excluding its own good intentions.

quote: Once you're sucked into the leisurely narrative, it's hard to resist.

quote: Its triumph is that it is never exactly boring, only dulled. It's a movie in acute need of sharpening.

quote: A simple story, magnificently told.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: It's a rousing adventure, a touching romance, and a stirring drama.
title: Dances with Wolves

quote: A stunning combination of all-American boyishness and sweeping grandeur.

quote: Costner (with Michael Blake's screenplay) creates a vision so childlike, so willfully romantic, it's hard to put up a fight.

quote: Recalls the sweep as well as the intimacy of a David Lean epic.

quote: [A] beautiful and soft-headed frontier epic, which looks at Native Americans through New Age-colored glasses.

quote: It is competent melodrama spun off from a fiendishly clever book.

quote: Its animators' pens are wands; their movement enchants.

quote: It is something special.

quote: The sweetest and most openhearted love fable since The Princess Bride.

quote: Pretty Woman seduces all but the most wary.

quote: As shamelessly irresistible as the Roy Orbison oldie that accompanies the credits.

quote: If you must see The Wild Bunch, be sure to take along a barf bag.
title: The Wild Bunch

quote: It's a traumatic poem of violence, with imagery as ambivalent as Goya's.

quote: The Wild Bunch is an American masterpiece, one of the greatest films ever produced in the Hollywood system.
title: The Wild Bunch

quote: It is certainly one of the best westerns ever made, and the best film of any kind to come out in 1969.
title: The Wild Bunch

quote: It's a towering achievement that grows more riveting and resonant with the years.
title: The Wild Bunch

quote: The Wild Bunch is Peckinpah's most complex inquiry into the metamorphosis of man into myth. Not incidentally, it is also a raucous, violent, powerful feat of American film making.

quote: Film at 145 minutes is far over-length, and should be tightened extensively, particularly in first half.
title: The Wild Bunch

quote: The on-screen carnage established a new level in American movies, but few of the films that followed in its wake could duplicate Peckinpah's depth of feeling.

quote: The director was one of the very few filmmakers who could create a world that, however nastier or more brutish than the one we live in, never felt smaller or less complex.

quote: Seeing this restored version is like understanding the film at last... It makes all the difference in the world.

quote: The formula remains evergreen -- two attractive leads are thrown together by quirk; develop antipathies, even loathing; then, ultimately decide they have overreacted and are hopelessly in love.

quote: An uninspired formula movie with another fine performance by Michelle Pfeiffer.
title: One Fine Day

quote: The Coen Brothers are among the most able practitioners in America and this film is one of their best attempts to turn a familiar genre -- the True Crime drama -- into something miles away from the ordinary.

quote: Two words. Marge Gunderson.

quote: The film is a work of brick-by-brick world-building in the service of characters whose ordinariness is just as carefully crafted.

quote: A small, supremely satisfying film. Heck and you betcha, it is.
title: Fargo

quote: A few scenes go around in circles, as if snow-blind, and the humor may be too inward and contorted for some tastes. But McDormand brings order to the weirdness and warms it up.

title: Fargo

quote: The Coens remain effortlessly ahead of the American field.

quote: To watch it is to experience steadily mounting delight, as you realize the filmmakers have taken enormous risks, gotten away with them and made a movie that is completely original, and as familiar as an old shoe.

title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers

title: Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers

quote: Miss Hepburn, as a comedienne, is perhaps a greater star than she ever was at any prior cinema period, as a serious actress. This comes near being her champion achievement.

quote: This frothy theatre adaptation dates from the period when Hollywood had pretty much perfected the art of the romantic comedy.

title: The Philadelphia Story

quote: Utterly beguiling, funny and romantic ...
title: The Philadelphia Story

quote: George Cukor gives it the royal treatment with a splendid supporting cast...

title: Singin' in the Rain

quote: ...this one's the Taj Mahal, Armstrong's footprint on the moon, the 2001 Arizona-New York World Series, the Clash's London Calling, and the perfect foamy head on an expertly poured Guinness.

quote: One of the shining glories of the American musical.

quote: If you've never seen it and don't, you're bonkers.

title: Singin' in the Rain

quote: Fifty years later, it's still a delight with everybody working at the top of his or her game.

quote: The ultimate nostalgic source text is itself a pomo homage to a lost moment.
title: Singin' in the Rain

title: Singin' in the Rain

quote: There is no movie musical more fun than Singin' in the Rain, and few that remain as fresh over the years.

quote: The appeal of the film is its music; its dancing arid its carefree charm.

quote: Imperfect, then, but intermittently awe-inspiring.

quote: Fresher than ever.

quote: One of the most imaginative musical confections turned out by Hollywood in years.

title: An American in Paris

quote: Astaire could still dance up a storm, no doubt about it, and this has its moments.

quote: It's an intermittently charming trifle with directorial style to burn in the place of any kind of satisfactory substance.

quote: ...can clunk like a tin can in the dryer. But hey, we're talking Audrey Hepburn and Fred Astaire, so that's some mighty elegant slack we're willing to cut here.

title: Funny Face

quote: ...the final scene, a tender sequence that you can sop up with a sponge, but if you aren't moved by it you probably stick kittens with pins.

quote: One of the landmarks -- not merely of the movies, but of 20th-century art.

quote: Do yourself an aesthetic favor: Take the plunge.

quote: It's a superbly creepy thriller, with universal themes...An essential movie in anyone's canon.

quote: Prepare yourselves rather for a lengthy and restless stretch on tenterhooks.

quote: What's going on is sort of confused.

quote: A terrifically entertaining comedy-thriller.

quote: As time goes by, the appeal of Casablanca shows no sign of diminishing.

quote: Dirty Dancing works best when it's most direct and unpretentious.

quote: The film, for all its mayhem and fury, is too distant to be truly disturbing; it treats everything with an impatient, born-too-late shrug.

quote: Tarantino's palpable enthusiasm, his unapologetic passion for what he's created, reinvigorates this venerable plot and, mayhem aside, makes it involving for longer than you might suspect.

quote: It's unclear whether this macho thriller does anything to improve the state of the world or our understanding of it, but it certainly sets off enough rockets to hold and shake us for every one of its 99 minutes.

quote: It's dynamite on a short fuse.

quote: You may not like the terms Tarantino sets, but you have to admit he succeeds on them.

quote: A tour de force.

quote: A small, modestly budgeted crime movie of sometimes dazzling cinematic pyrotechnics and over-the- top dramatic energy.

quote: Those who survive it emerge in a shell-shocked euphoria -- so good and so blunt is the writing.

quote: Although Platoon is not the easiest film to watch, it is one of the best at reminding us that the cinema is not always interested in evading or distorting history. Sometimes it tells the truth.

quote: This is movie-making with a zealot's fervor.

quote: Platoon is filled with one fine performance after another, and one can only wish that every person who saw the cartoonish war fantasy that was Rambo would buy a ticket to Platoon and bear witness to something closer to the truth.

quote: ...it's still the standard against which all other movies about the Vietnam War are judged.

quote: The movie is beautifully written (by Stone), constructed with strong, clean lines, immaculately paced and regularly surprising.

quote: These actors seem driven less by real emotions than Eveready bunny batteries.

quote: A predictable, surprisingly uninvolving affair.

quote: The younger actors are now more confident.

quote: A spectacular piece of work that carries the new "Star Wars" tradition forward.

title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: The Empire Strikes Back is a worthy sequel to Star Wars, equal in both technical mastery and characterization, suffering only from the familiarity with the effects generated in the original and imitated too much by others.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: Irvin Kershner directed the actors this time around, and without the benefit of Lucas's personal affection they seem stiffer, more clenched.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: An extended ricochet from one incendiary set-piece battle to another which still finds time to attend to plot, pace and character.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: The total effect is fast and attractive and occasionally amusing. Like a good hot dog, that's something of an achievement in a field where unpalatable junk is the rule.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: By far the best part of the trilogy, Empire is a classic that completely transcends its genre, with a reputation that can only grow and grow.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: A Star Wars that has not only lost much of its humor and charm but more important a good deal of its innocence, traveling in the process light years away from the shiny first magnitude of its original world.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: The Empire Strikes Back is a technological triumph, a cornucopia of intergalactic tchotchkes.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: For many Star Wars fans, this second installment is the best of the George Lucas trilogy: a dark, ultimately melancholy, even philosophical episode that has no triumphant happy ending.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: The most classic in its style, design and narrative.
title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

quote: Mandy Patinkin, an actor not known for humor, is particularly wonderful as Inigo, a Spaniard out to avenge the death of his father at the hands...
title: The Princess Bride

title: The Princess Bride

quote: The Princess Bride easily transcends expectations, as a fantasy that has a few pertinent things to say about the genre, including the odd fact that the heroes of such things are often prettier than the heroines.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: As you watch this enchanting fantasy, feel free to be thrilled or to giggle, as you wish.
title: The Princess Bride

title: The Princess Bride

title: The Princess Bride

title: The Princess Bride

quote: The film works well enough, providing its fair share of laughs and thrills, and in technical terms it is by far Reiner`s most professional job of direction.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Shall we re-wind and give it another spin? As you wish...
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Based on William Goldman's novel, this is a post-modern fairy tale that challenges and affirms the conventions of a genre that may not be flexible enough to support such horseplay.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Rob Reiner's friendly 1987 fairy-tale adventure delicately mines the irony inherent in its make-believe without ever undermining the effectiveness of the fantasy.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: The leads are vacuous; the absurdities sometimes forced and obvious.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Since its release more than 15 years ago, The Princess Bride has often been copied, but never equaled.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: This material might easily have lent itself to broad parody or become too cute for its own good. But Mr. Reiner presents it as a bedtime story, pure and simple.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Children can see it as a bright, frothy adventure while adults will appreciate the subtlety and the sheer wit.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: It's a lively, fun-loving, but nevertheless epic look at the nature of true love.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: It is filled with good-hearted fun.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Bride achieves much more than most film comedies.
title: The Princess Bride

quote: Entertainment that propels the audience inexorably from one excitement to the next.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: It's all done with such a great spirit of high adventure and good humor that you don't even begin to count the corpses... The finale suggests that Ford's Indiana Jones character will soon be back with further adventures, and I'm all in favor of it.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Raiders is an assured, relaxed, impressive work. It's almost impossible to resist. It's no more substantial than cotton candy -- but it's easily the best piece of entertainment Hollywood has produced in 1981.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: This bullwhip-cracking action-adventure launched the series starring Harrison Ford.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Raiders of the Lost Ark has more size than substance but nevertheless it's a delightful special big surprise package of a movie that should turn Indiana Jones into a national figure.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: There is a charm and vitality to Raiders of the Ark, which Spielberg later admitted was "the first movie where I actually shot the movie without thinking".
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Yes, it's as entertaining as you have heard. Maybe more so. Raiders of the Lost Ark is, in fact, about as entertaining as a commercial movie can be.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: As action adventure goes, it's about the best there is.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Steven Spielberg's rollicking adventure yarn still looks buoyant and dashing after 30 years.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: The first and finest Indiana Jones adventure.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Raiders of the Lost Ark has it all -- or, anyway, more than enough to transport moviegoers back to the dazzling, thrill-sated matinee idyls of old.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: The thrills are fully consumed while you're seeing this movie, and it's totally over when it's over. It's a workout. You feel as if you'd been to the desert digs: at the end your mind is blank, yet you're parched, you're puffing hard -- you want relief.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: ...a crackerjack fantasy-adventure that shapes its pulp sensibilities and cliff-hanging serial origins into an exhilarating escapist entertainment that will have broad-cased summer audiences in the palm of its hand.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: One would think that a collaboration between Steven Spielberg and George Lucas would produce something better than this giggly pastiche of a Republic serial...
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: The picture is offering you a pact: you agree to be a kid again, in return for which Raiders will give you old-time movie thrills expressed in slick modern cinematic terms. No, thanks.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: Whether you swallow it or not, see it for a handful of totally unexpected visual jokes, worth the price of admission alone.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: This is the kind of movie that, even today, audiences immediately fall in love with. It has all the right ingredients: a smart script, a likable hero, a dash of romance, more than a touch of comedy, and a lot of fast-paced action.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: To get to the point immediately, Raiders of the Lost Ark is one of the most deliriously funny, ingenious and stylish American adventure movies ever made.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: The movie is just plain fun.
title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

quote: It's like a stoned, slapstick 1984: a nightmare comedy in which the comedy is just an aspect of the nightmarishness.

quote: [A] darkly funny and truly visionary retro-futurist fantasy.
title: Brazil

quote: Brazil is a stinging, Strangelovian satire of the power of the bureaucracy in an Orwellian landscape.
title: Brazil

quote: Brazil offers a chillingly hilarious vision of the near-future.
title: Brazil

quote: Terry Gilliam's ferociously creative black comedy is filled with wild tonal contrasts, swarming details, and unfettered visual invention -- every shot carries a charge of surprise and delight.
title: Brazil

quote: Fortunately the story of an alternative future is realised with such visual imagination and sparky humour that it's only half way through that the plot's weaknesses become apparent.
title: Brazil

quote: A superb example of the power of comedy to underscore serious ideas, even solemn ones.
title: Brazil

quote: Gilliam understood that all futuristic films end up quaintly evoking the naive past in which they were made, and turned the principle into a coherent comic aesthetic.
title: Brazil

quote: For all its occasional long-windedness and visual dazzle, Brazil may be the Strangelove of the 1980s.
title: Brazil

quote: The movie is very hard to follow. I have seen it twice, and am still not sure exactly who all the characters are, or how they fit.
title: Brazil

quote: Sigourney Weaver is merely terrific... When she straps on her armament to do battle with the aliens, she makes Sylvester Stallone look like a pipsqueak.

quote: Beyond dispute, however, is the film's timeless worth as a cathartic work, especially in terms of its accidentally commentary on the sexism of the corporate structure.
title: Aliens

quote: Scene to scene, encounter to encounter, its tension builds unrelentingly. So, fasten your seat belts. It`s a blast.
title: Aliens

quote: [Aliens] is a spectacular example of state-of-the-art science fiction simply because it never tries to be overtly spectacular.
title: Aliens

quote: It's blaster action, not Gothic future-horror. Fortunately, director-screenwriter James Cameron has shaped his film around the defiant intelligence and sensual athleticism of Weaver, and that's where Aliens works best.
title: Aliens

quote: This film is also the best monster movie of the year and the best picture of any kind to open so far this summer. Put it another way: Aliens is the Jaws of the '80s.
title: Aliens

quote: Action thrillers assail but rarely test us; this is the tautest, most provoking, and altogether most draining example ever made.
title: Aliens

quote: Count me out of the fan club for this one.
title: Aliens

quote: The trouble Ripley has found this time is exponentially bigger and scarier than anything she encountered in Ridley Scott's memorably minimalist, eerily elegant 1979 film.
title: Aliens

quote: One sequel that surpasses the original.
title: Aliens

quote: There is always an interesting tension in Cameron's work between masculine and feminine qualities. When it finally hits the fan here, we're in for the mother of all battles.
title: Aliens

quote: Aliens ends up as a wild and woolly roller-coaster ride of a movie which should attract anxious crowds of thrill fans as it cuts a swath through theaters from here to Alpha Centauri.
title: Aliens

quote: A flaming, flashing, crashing, crackling blow-'em-up show that keeps you popping from your seat despite your better instincts and the basically conventional scare tactics.
title: Aliens

quote: Makes up for lack of surprise with sheer volume of thrills and chills.
title: Aliens

quote: When it comes to the logical marriage of action, adventure, and science fiction, few films are as effective or accomplished as Aliens.
title: Aliens

quote: The ads for Aliens claim that this movie will frighten you as few movies have, and, for once, the ads don't lie.
title: Aliens

quote: "Absolutely smashing!"
title: Aliens

quote: It's much funnier, and sadder, watched stone-cold sober.

title: Withnail & I

quote: It is at once a coming-of-age comedy and a fond farewell to an era.

title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: Of all miracles readily apparent on screen, perhaps the greatest is that the film even got made in the first place.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: This is a movie with the excitement of a cavalry charge.

quote: Deathless, and looking as good as new.

quote: You'll need to dedicate half a day to it - but this deserves to be seen again on the big screen.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: It was a big bold project and has turned out a big bold film.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: [It] remains one of the most intelligent, handsome, and influential of all war epics.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: The passage of time has only proved how difficult it is to run ideas, history, characterisation and landscape in harness on this sort of scale.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: Even the flies in the opening Cairo scene jump out at you.

quote: It reduces a legendary figure to conventional movie-hero size amidst magnificent and exotic scenery but a conventional lot of action-film clichés.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: An epic achievement in filmmaking.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: A cracking good adventure yarn, as well as a disturbing psychological profile of a man destined to become a great leader but an even greater dupe.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: It's an astonishing, unrepeatable epic.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: Riveting from beginning to end, featuring stellar performances, amazing cinematography, and a story without a trace of fat, the film does everything an epic is supposed to do -- and more.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: Grand in every sense, David Lean's film is an example of an established director full of confidence and ambition.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: We remember the quiet, empty passages, the sun rising across the desert, the intricate lines traced by the wind in the sand.
title: Lawrence of Arabia

quote: Lawrence is too emotionally overpowering for critical reservations.

quote: All of the film's provocation and jaded sexual politics are flavoured with histrionic cynicism and disillusion.

title: A Clockwork Orange

quote: What our nightmares have accustomed us to see in dreams, Stanley Kubrick's A Clockwork Orange shows us in broad daylight. It is one of the most unsettling films in the whole of cinema.

quote: A mind shattering experience with its exaggerated violence and outrageous vulgarity.

quote: A painless, bloodless, and ultimately pointless futuristic fantasy.

quote: A very bad film -- snide, barely competent, and overdrawn -- that enjoys a perennial popularity, perhaps because its confused moral position appeals to the secret Nietzscheans within us.

quote: A sexless, inhuman film, whose power derives from a ruthless subordination of its content to the demands of telling a good story.

quote: A Clockwork Orange is an ideological mess, a paranoid right-wing fantasy masquerading as an Orwellian warning.

quote: A most unusual -- and disorienting -- movie experience.

quote: It demands thought, compels the attention, and refuses to be dismissed.

quote: At once [Kubrick's] most thematically problematic film and his most unforgettably sensational.

quote: Peck's performance, in tortoiseshell glasses and a cream linen suit, is mesmerizing and serious.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird

title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Justly celebrated.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: To Kill a Mockingbird is a time capsule, preserving hopes and sentiments from a kinder, gentler, more naive America.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: To Kill A Mockingbird is a product of American realism, and it is a rare and worthy treasure.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: This one is always just off the boil.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Minor shortcomings in a rewarding film.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Universally recognized as a classic, and the label is well deserved.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Harper Lee's highly regarded first novel has been artfully and delicately translated to the screen.
title: To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Apocalypse has the expressive extravagance of a Wagner opera-and not merely because the swooping helicopter scene is set to the "Ride of the Valkyries."
title: Apocalypse Now

quote: It has coherence, truthfulness, and conviction-up to a point.
title: Apocalypse Now

quote: It's the cumulative effect generated by mixing richly portentous imagery with absurdly portentous prose, starkly portentous sound and flatulently portentous music.
title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

quote: Apocalypse Now is not merely the greatest film to come out of the Vietnam experience but one of the great works about the madness of our times.

quote: The best of it is grand, mysterious and oddly possessed.

quote: Undoubtedly it is one of the best films about war ever made.
title: Apocalypse Now

quote: A film that needs to be seen on the big screen.
title: Apocalypse Now

quote: It is mystical, daring, poetic, thrilling, appalling and never less than utterly mesmerising.
title: Apocalypse Now

quote: A gilt-edged, no-messing, accept-no-substitutes masterpiece.
title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

quote: ...it's wonderful to see this hallucinatory folly-cum-near masterpiece again on the big screen.
title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

title: Apocalypse Now

quote: ...the movie still has the power to floor you with its stunning sounds and imagery.

quote: "Return of the Jedi," the final act of George Lucas' first "Star Wars" trilogy, is the best one yet.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: It's everything it ought to be -- glorious, exhilarating, exciting, absorbing, technically wondrous. But there also is something bittersweet in the knowledge that, with Jedi, we are bidding a fond farewell to all of the characters we got to know so well.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: The characters and dialogue get lost somewhere between the bug-eyed monsters and the exploding spaceships, but it is all so much fun it probably really does not matter a whole lot.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: With this last of the central Star Wars cycle, there is the sense of the closing of a circle, of leaving behind real friends. It is accomplished with a weight and a new maturity that seem entirely fitting, yet the movie has lost none of its sense of fun.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Lucas has once again recycled the B movies of his youth: jungle movies, gangster movies, pirate movies, you name it. He culls bits from them that still have oomph and mounts them with a Sesame-Street zap.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Highly entertaining.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Though the 1983 film's effects seem almost quaint by today's awesome standards, Jedi has something the newer movies don't: characters we care about, not to mention a plot that involves both them and us.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Unfortunately, it conveys the sense that the machinery has already started to wear down, and the inventiveness to wear thin.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: The trilogy is superior entertainment that, have assimilated its sources, has itself become the real thing, making movie history.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: The appeal, perhaps, will be strongest to the young.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Though slow to pick up the pace and saddled with an anticlimatic sequence at the finish, Jedi is nonetheless reasonably fast paced for its 133-minute length, a visual treat throughout.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: With every Jedi disappointment comes a new appreciation: for the genius of John Williams' music; for all that father-son stuff that once felt so mushy and now, with maturity, feels elemental; for Han's ironic-hero stance.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: It is not as exciting as Star Wars itself, which had the advantage of novelty. But it is better and more satisfying than The Empire Strikes Back...
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: With its feints at horror and pathos, the third Star Wars film is the most Disney-esque in its emotional outline, yet that outline is buried beneath an obnoxiously hyped-up pace that reduces the emotions to rubble.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: In scope and ambition, Jediresembles nothing so much as the next level of a computer game, with a new environment, new gadgets and new creatures.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Though it looks almost too polished, a handful of eye-smacking action scenes were breakthroughs in precomputer cinematic graphics. And when the film moves, it does so with blazing energy and awesome noise.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: The episodic plot and abundant spectacle do not drown out the human interest.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Jedi couldn't end the Star Wars trilogy on a happier note.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: The film is a huge, rousing finale that resolves all plot twists, settles all accounts, reunites old friends and sweeps to a climax that all but blows the theater apart.
title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

quote: Seventy years on such sombreness seems timely, as does Harry Lime, Welles's deliciously elusive antihero.
title: The Third Man

title: The Third Man

quote: Reed and screenwriter Graham Greene let the story unfold slowly and deliberately, like the cigarette smoke that floats around the characters, and keep us guessing at every step.
title: The Third Man

quote: Like many, I have loved this thriller of conscience and betrayal most of my moviegoing life.
title: The Third Man

quote: This is a film which does away with such cretinous inanity as offering up goodies and baddies, instead presenting its cast of characters as doing things which they believe to be good, but are not seen as such through the eyes of observers.
title: The Third Man

quote: "The Third Man" is important not just because of its technique but because of its theme ...
title: The Third Man

quote: Few films more effectively capture the crumbling infrastructure and opportunistic lawlessness of postwar Europe. And none better translate the snaking treachery of Graham Greene's stories and his worlds of cynical expats and casual betrayal.
title: The Third Man

quote: A lot funnier than you remember it, Carol Reed's immortal 1949 film noir seems to exist in the space between two worlds: an earlier time when thrillers were mostly serious affairs, and a future one, when such supremely witty entertainments felt passé.
title: The Third Man

quote: The Third Man is a movie of sobering pleasures.
title: The Third Man

quote: It transformed the way I looked at the world.
title: The Third Man

quote: This is a unique classic.
title: The Third Man

quote: An iconic film noir that's still fresh despite being familiar.
title: The Third Man

quote: Welles gives Harry a mask of irony that turns all moral judgment back on itself. He turns a mass murderer into a wry rogue, and makes his villainy all the more horrifying because we rather like him.
title: The Third Man

quote: Seen today, The Third Man ... can be appreciated as a prophetic statement on the eventual moral bankruptcy of the one-world euphoria that clouded men's minds immediately after the second 'war to end all wars.'
title: The Third Man

quote: Top credit must go to Mr. Reed for molding all possible elements into a thriller of superconsequence.
title: The Third Man

quote: For lovers of film noir, The Third Man is unquestionably a must-see -- one of the masterpieces of a genre that has contained everything from milestone motion pictures to low-budget potboilers.
title: The Third Man

quote: The Third Man is like the exhausted aftermath of Casablanca.
title: The Third Man

quote: a full-blooded, absorbing story
title: The Third Man

quote: One of the glories of postwar cinema, and quite possibly one of the most sheerly enjoyable movies ever made.
title: The Third Man

quote: However hoked-up and self-regarding, The Third Man ... remains an indelible experience.
title: The Third Man

quote: Complex, volatile, ironic and disquieting, Scorsese's Goodfellas is a masterly achievement in intense observation.
title: Goodfellas

quote: Is it a great movie? I don't think so. But it's a triumphant piece of filmmaking-journalism presented with the brio of drama.

title: Goodfellas

quote: Goodfellas is a terrifying film because, like much of Scorsese's best work, it is about the lives of avuncular psychopaths, and pretty-boy Liotta brilliantly encapsulates that fetid contradiction.
title: Goodfellas

quote: Brash and brilliant ...
title: Goodfellas

quote: Goodfellas is remorseless, its message terminally bleak.
title: Goodfellas

quote: It hasn't aged in the slightest.
title: Goodfellas

quote: Sure, it's a rush - but is that enough?
title: Goodfellas

title: Goodfellas

quote: Definitive, sky-high Scorsese, and the one towards which all his subsequent films have been reaching, Goodfellas is, put bluntly, the best movie of the director's career.
title: Goodfellas

quote: All of the performances are first-rate; Pesci stands out, though, with his seemingly unscripted manner. GoodFellas is easily one of the year`s best films.
