quote: Taking place almost entirely in one room, "The Breakfast Club" is the kind of movie -- and the kind of play -- that's hardly seen anymore. And good riddance.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Hughes has a wonderful knack for communicating the feelings of teenagers, as well as an obvious rapport with his exceptional cast - who deserve top grades.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Hughes may deserve more plaudits as a social worker than a filmmaker, but you have to admit his hokey situation plays. The reason is the five terrific young actors, who bring more conviction to these parts than they perhaps deserve.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Nothing really changes. You hear nothing you haven't heard before. But you know that for them it is happening for the first time, and they deserve compassion. I'm not sure that's a good enough reason to see "The Breakfast Club."
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Rarely have on-screen teens felt this authentic. They bluster, bicker and trade horrible insults (whence the film's R rating), then suddenly expose their most guarded feelings.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: While meticulously drawn, the film's characters are so stereotypically representative that only the lamest of moviegoers will not determine their respective backgrounds and problems long before the plodding movie does.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: In nine hours of threatening, bickering and, eventually, poignant (but never maudlin) self-revelation, the stereotypes dissolve and re-form.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: John Hughes's 1985 film seems meant to explain 80s youngsters to yesterday's youth, and comes to the comforting conclusion that they're just as alienated, idealistic, and vulnerable as the baby boomers of the 1960s.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Does director John Hughes really believe, as he writes here, that 'when you grow up, your heart dies.' It may. But not unless the brain has already started to rot with films like this.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: An iconic movie of the '80s, with all the unappealing baggage that suggests.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: The Breakfast Club doesn't need earthshaking revelations; it's about kids who grow willing to talk to one another, and it has a surprisingly good ear for the way they speak.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Mr. Hughes, having thought up the characters and simply flung them together, should have left well enough alone.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Shot in sequence during 1984, The Breakfast Club became a benchmark for all that followed in the genre.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: In The Breakfast Club, Hughes has created a surprisingly enduring motion picture that is still effective 13 years after its theatrical debut.
title: The Breakfast Club

quote: Debuting director Chuck Russell elicits poor performances from most of his thesps, making it difficult to differentiate between pic's comic relief and unintended howlers.

quote: The film's dream sequences are ingenious, and they feature some remarkable nightmare images and special effects.

quote: While it's better than its predecessor, it's still not quite up to its inspiration.

quote: This is filmmaking by the numbers, without soul.

quote: A genre film that won't totally insult your intelligence or your eyes.

quote: It's blatant exploitation of the lowest order.

quote: Michael Myers is back. And no, you still shouldn't care.

quote: Spielberg goes a long, long way toward overcoming his tendencies toward the shallow, but the visceral punch of his not-quite-masterful film is softened by an almost neurotic slickness that keeps getting in the way of the [issues it raises].
title: Saving Private Ryan

quote: Spielberg obviously decided that blood and guts meant just that, and so he arranged his violence into a semblance of pure disorder. The illusion holds, complete with severed limbs and wellsprings of blood, and it feels honorable.
title: Saving Private Ryan

quote: Saving Private Ryan is Steven Spielberg's best war film and one of the two or three best movies the director has made.
title: Saving Private Ryan

quote: The great Hollywood battle films have told us repeatedly that war is hell. Saving Private Ryan, more than any other, is the one that shows it.
title: Saving Private Ryan

quote: You'd think a movie whose sole point is basically "Don't fall head-over-heels on the basis of good looks alone" would avoid being as swell-looking but substance-depleted as "Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss."
title: Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss

quote: O'Haver makes his film a witty homage to vintage screen romance while keeping its perspective on the here and now.
title: Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss

quote: "Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss" isn't at all deep. But in its cheerful, fun-loving way, it reminds us that in our endlessly self-referential, image-conscious pop culture, fantasy is what makes the world go 'round.
title: Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss

quote: "Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss" seems besotted by its sexuality, and wouldn't be able to pass this test: Would the film be interesting if it were about heteros?
title: Billy's Hollywood Screen Kiss

quote: In this genial but strained and arch frolic, the one real joke is not only "in" but it wears thin and even frantic.
title: The Barefoot Executive

quote: Technically brilliant though short on narrative, "The Black Cauldron" is a painless, old-fashioned way to take out the kids, and a triumph for the animation department at the Disney studio, where it has been in development for almost a dozen years.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: The characters, though cute and cuddly and sweet and mean and ugly and simply awful, don't really have much to do that would remain of interest to any but the youngest minds.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: It's quite good, though by the impossible standards the film sets for itself it inevitably falls short.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: As usual it is technically excellent, but the charm, characterisation and sheer good humour that made features like Pinocchio and Jungle Book so enjoyable are sadly absent.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: This is the 25th full-length animated feature from Walt Disney studios, and professionally put together as it is, many of the ingredients may seem programmed to those who have seen some of the others.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: By the end of The Black Cauldron I was remembering, with something of a shock of nostalgia, the strength and utter storytelling conviction of the early Disney animators. The Black Cauldron is a return to the tradition.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: The backgrounds are as richly textured and detailed as in any other Disney film.
title: The Black Cauldron

quote: It is good to see the Disney craftsmen doing what they do best on such a grand and risky scale. If one has time for only one space opera this season, this is the one to choose.
title: The Black Hole

quote: Disney's most ambitious and costly production to date -- about a spaceship crew which encounters a Black Hole and a long-lost madman -- and if looks were everything, you could hardly fault it.
title: The Black Hole

quote: It cost half as much as Star Trek and looks better -- not as lavish, perhaps, but more original. The special effects are fancy, and the design even more so.
title: The Black Hole

quote: Takes us all the way to the rim of space only to bog us down in a talky melodrama whipped up out of mad scientists and haunted houses.
title: The Black Hole

quote: The plot is completely confused, and kids, who are much better at these things than adults, will enjoy its twists and turns. Ustinov is fine as the rum swilling, yo-ho-hoing Blackbeard.
title: Blackbeard's Ghost

quote: With Foster, Hayes and Niven in the leading roles and McKern and Pickles off the sidelines, the film is enlivened by a superior cast.
title: Candleshoe

quote: The fun, as usual with Disney pix, comes in the believable sight gags provided along the way. Also as usual, it's a good cast of veterans and nothing to tax them beyond their abilities, all ably kept in pace by director Norman Tokar.
title: The Cat from Outer Space

quote: Routine hi-jinks ensue, mixing strangely with ecology consciousness-raising, pseudo-scientific jargon, and everyday telekinesis.
title: The Cat from Outer Space

quote: The Cat From Outer Space is likely to keep the under-14's amused, at least if supplemented by plenty of popcorn.
title: The Cat from Outer Space

quote: Cheetah brings to focus the concerns of experts and laymen alike.
title: Cheetah

quote: An ideological intervention from the Disney machine: the Cold War re-heated for the kiddies.
title: Condorman

quote: It is painless and chaste, and it has a lot of beautiful scenery and beautiful clothes. There are worse things to watch while you eat popcorn.
title: Condorman

quote: The sequel is even more banal than the original. And it's difficult to take seriously the new film's position against the commercialism of sports, given Disney's NHL ties.
title: D2: The Mighty Ducks

quote: [An] overpoweringly charming concoction of standard Gaelic tall stories, fantasy and romance.
title: Darby O'Gill and the Little People

quote: For those of a sentimental turn, there is the delight of watching young Connery romancing the ineffably wholesome Janet Munro, a couple of years before things turned nasty for Commander Bond at Crab Key with the somewhat more knowing Ursula Andress.
title: Darby O'Gill and the Little People

quote: The script has its moments, especially when Cosby is around as the Devil's aide, but the film finally subsides in a welter of structural flaws and heartwarming sentiment.
title: The Devil and Max Devlin

quote: The performances are attractive though, with one exception, not especially memorable.
title: The Devil and Max Devlin

quote: While Walkabout found adequate material in the wonder of nature and the enormity of the young peoples' experience, A Far Off Place plugs into the tired conventions of violence in order to flesh out its plot.
title: A Far Off Place

quote: Flight of the Navigator won't earn a place among Disney's classics. but it's a perfectly entertaining sci-fi movie that does a creditable job with the stale human-meets-alien theme.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: When the film shifts into the action mode in its second half -- the flying saucer returns to aid in David`s rescue -- it becomes quite bright and lively.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: If there is more than a little something borrowed from Spielberg, Kleiser's movie is amiably undemanding entertainment that says the right things, albeit without great originality.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: There's no mistaking Flight of the Navigator for a really first-rate children's picture like, say, The Black Stallion. But Flight of the Navigator is an enjoyable film that encourages kids to use their heads.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: Whereas its plot may be derivative--and at several junctures, unconvincing--"Flight of the Navigator" nevertheless manages to develop considerable humor and poignancy from David's predicament and what he does about it.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: This children's adventure turns out to be, despite its title, less of a Star Wars trip than an entertaining variation on the time-travel adventure Back to the Future.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: Instead of creating an eye-opening panorama, Flight of the Navigator looks through the small end of the telescope. Life on Earth is magnified but without an expansive vision.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: One for the none too discerning youngster.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: This is a film with its head in the clouds, its feet on the ground and -- just often enough -- its heart on its sleeve, in which space-age special effects take second place to family emotions.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: At times a bit too precious, especially inside the young navigator's spacecraft, but the warm regard for character, as well as for our often-inhospitable planetary home, makes for a reasonably good time.
title: Flight of the Navigator

quote: Older kids may be less enthused by this mousy story, though parents, particularly Basil Rathbone fans, will marvel at the accuracy with which this sophisticated homage hits Holmes.
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: There's no need for details - you know his methods, Watson - but suffice it to say that The Great Mouse Detective's few tunes are unmemorable and all the action (aside from the inventive chase sequences) is snooze-worthy.
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: "The Great Mouse Detective" reflects the energy and enthusiasm of a talented group of young artists stretching their wings for the first time.
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: As usual with film noir, however, it is the villain who steals the heart and one is rooting for in the breathtaking showdown high up in the cogs and ratchets of Big Ben.
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: Small children may be afraid of some of the bad characters -- the Disney Studio's gift for creating really nasty bad guys means that they are scary -- but they will love the cute, brave mice and cheer their triumphs. Adults will enjoy the wit and style.
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: What's fun is the carefree way the animators swing through their story, using the freedom of the cartoon form to blend 19th century realism with images that seem borrowed from more recent special-effects pictures
title: The Great Mouse Detective

quote: It tries so desperately hard to please us that, in the end, we almost want to grab Steele and John Davidson, bang their heads together, and snarl: Will you please stop smiling and get on with the movie!
title: The Happiest Millionaire

quote: It's not surprising that they haven't got around to changing the plot formula, only the scenery.
title: Herbie Goes Bananas

quote: A cheerful, four-cylinder children's movie, though its car jokes aren't good for much mileage.
title: Herbie Goes Bananas

quote: The film contains eye-filling scenery, exciting races and lively , stunts. Every thing, in fact, except spontaneously original wit.
title: Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo

quote: It's a veritable bagful of box office treats.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Though children may be satisfied (if the witch stuff doesn't scare them) adults will have a harder time with the by-the-numbers confrontations between the witches and the plucky youths.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Dreadful.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Hocus Pocus is harmless, but it's about as much fun as celebrating Mardi Gras under the influence of candy corn.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Silly but irresistible.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: All things considered, Hocus Pocus is much more entertaining than a pimple-people picture has a right to be.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Hocus Pocus remains a delightful family comedy, spooky but never scary as it romps its merry way through the graveyard.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: With Bette Midler and her onscreen sisters shamelessly hamming things up, it looks as if those involved in making this inoffensive flight of fantasy had more fun than anyone over 12 will have watching it.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: [Midler, Najimy and Parker] perform a show-stopping version of 'I Put a Spell on You' at a Halloween party, but otherwise it's slim pickings.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Apparently too much eye of newt got into the formula for Hocus Pocus, transforming a potentially wicked Bette Midler vehicle into an unholy mess.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: As a family film, Hocus Pocus is passable --- provided you don't have particularly high standards.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Hocus Pocus is really two movies -- a sophomoric caper for teenage boys and a dark lark for fans of Disney farce, an abracadabra Sister Act. Both of them are failures.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: In the not-too-distant future look for Hocus Pocus in the rental-store bins, or as part of a Halloween "Trick or Treat" package (three bags of candies with Hocus Pocus for $5.95).
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: Watching the movie is like attending a party you weren't invited to, and where you don't know anybody, and they're all in on a joke but won't explain it to you.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: It's acceptable scary-silly kid fodder that adults will find only mildly insulting. Unless they're Bette Midler fans. In which case it's depressing as hell.
title: Hocus Pocus

quote: The laughs run out early and the balance of the film relies on special effects to tickle the audience's funny bone.
title: Honey I Blew Up the Kid

quote: I was not a fan of Honey, I Shrunk The Kids, but that movie shines as a beacon of originality compared to Honey, I Blew Up the Kid, the sequel.
title: Honey I Blew Up the Kid

quote: [It's] in the best tradition of Disney -- and even better than that, because it is not so juvenile that adults won't be thoroughly entertained.
title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

quote: Sterling entertainment...
title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

quote: As sweet, straightforward and funny as its title.
title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

quote: Though it relies on special effects, this cutie-pie caper never loses sight of the protagonists amid the bigger-than-life Cheerios and 40-foot blades of grass.
title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

quote: The special effects are all there, nicely in place, and the production values are sound, but the movie is dead in the water.
title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

quote: Teaming for the first time Kevin Spacey and Samuel Jackson, arguably the two best actors of their generation, in perfectly fitting roles is a shrewd move and the best element of this fact-inspired but overwrought thriller
title: The Negotiator

quote: A hybrid action-drama featuring the choreographed pyrotechnics of director Gray and a battle of words between contrasting hostage negotiators Jackson and Spacey.
title: The Negotiator

quote: "The Negotiator" slogs on for two hours and 20 minutes, and there's hardly a real laugh or a genuine thrill in it.
title: The Negotiator

quote: The Negotiator deserves a place among the best action/thrillers of the year. This is a Dog Day Afternoon for the '90s.
title: The Negotiator

quote: To the extent the setup allows Spacey and Jackson to go head to head, it's a good thing. But there are other elements in the film that aren't nearly as interesting or satisfying.
title: The Negotiator

quote: The movie's a thriller that really hums along, and I was intensely involved almost all the way. Only now, typing up my notes, do I fully realize how many formula elements it contains.
title: The Negotiator

quote: ike Mr. Jackson, Mr. Spacey cuts an impressively cryptic figure even when dealing in platitudes, and the two stars do get to make the sort of declarations that rarely crop up in everyday life.
title: The Negotiator

quote: Just about everyone in The Negotiator is either blowing off steam or holding it in, and that's the movie's chief pleasure. The action is really a pipeline into audience fantasies-of restraint and release, of hot-blooded aggression made cool.
title: The Negotiator

quote: I was bored well before the end, but found the first half hour pretty funny.
title: BASEketball

quote: Jenny McCarthy and Ernest Borgnine -- together at last.
title: BASEketball

quote: Their incessant, obscene banter is meant to be endearing; their total lack of presence makes it simply annoying.
title: BASEketball

quote: What kind of movie is it where Yasmine Bleeth is the best thing about it?
title: BASEketball

quote: The vulgar, obvious humor of Zucker brother David and South Park creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone elicits easy, guilty laughs, yet the material has an underlying innocence that's just shy of good clean fun.
title: BASEketball

quote: The kind of flick that serves itself up as the object of its own satire.
title: BASEketball

quote: If you're old enough to see this movie without a parent or guardian and all that sounds encouraging, this review has failed, and failed badly.
title: BASEketball

quote: [A] funny, gleefully offensive spoof of professional sports.
title: BASEketball

quote: The comedy sets up some very big targets -- the commercialization of sport, crass franchise owners, sentimental idolatry of players, exploitation of foreign workers by superstar merchandisers -- and then lobs tiny spitballs at them.
title: BASEketball

quote: It's not very funny and tries to buy laughs with puerile shocks.
title: BASEketball

quote: A bit late in the day, but nevertheless welcome.
title: Full Tilt Boogie

quote: The Governess could be an illustration of the ideas in Virginia Woolf's A Room of One's Own, in which she marvels at how necessary it is for men to have women to feel superior to.
title: The Governess

quote: Delightful from beginning to end, not only because of the clarity and charm with which Daniels and Farrow explore the problems of their characters, but also because the movie is so intelligent.
title: The Purple Rose of Cairo

quote: It's a sweet, lyrically funny, multi- layered work that again demonstrates that Woody Allen is our premier film maker who, standing something over 5 feet tall in his sneakers, towers above all others.
title: The Purple Rose of Cairo

quote: The players acquit themselves histrionically if not morally. Mitchum, [Kirk] Douglas and the Misses [Jane] Greer and [Rhonda] Fleming are all commendable.
title: Out of the Past

quote: Fairly well played, and very well photographed (by Nicholas Musuraca), the action develops a routine kind of pseudo-tension.
title: Out of the Past

quote: Each change of angle and shift of light evokes an inner disturbance; the actors seem to push through the dense shadow as through water, revealing fast people in slow motion ...
title: Out of the Past

quote: Direction by Jacques Tourneur pays close attention to mood development, achieving realistic flavor that is further emphasized by real life settings and topnotch lensing by Nicholas Musuraca.
title: Out of the Past

quote: The most delicate and nuanced of film noirs, graced with a reflective lyricism that almost lifts it out of the genre.
title: Out of the Past

quote: All these B movie poets were under contract to RKO in the winter of 1946, and produced the best movie of everyone involved -- once seen, never forgotten.
title: Out of the Past

quote: One of the greatest of all film noirs.
title: Out of the Past

quote: It's very snappy and quite intriguingly played by a cast that has been well and smartly directed by Jacques Tourneur.
title: Out of the Past

quote: Cinematic perfection, a Hollywood classic that's as great and as enjoyable as its reputation has promised.
title: Out of the Past

quote: Despite the grim and brooding background, Zhivago has a surging buoyant spirit that is unquenchable. Doctor Zhivago is more than a masterful motion picture; it is a life experience.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: One of those rare film adaptations which, unless you have already read the book, makes you wonder why anyone ever bothered to make the film at all.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Maurice Jarre's music is as beguiling as ever and Lean squeezes all the pathos that he can out of the romance between Sharif's Yuri Zhivago and Julie Christie's febrile and gorgeous Lara Antipova.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Epic seems too small a word for the sweeping ambition and romance of Doctor Zhivago.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Lean and Bolt pay tribute to a Tolstoyan ambition in Pasternak's samizdat novel, and also to a real contemporary relevance: the story of a suppressed writer.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Demands everything from the viewer while offering little in return, with Lean coming across like a despised schoolmaster not wanting to open himself up to his braying students.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Yes it's old-fashioned and sappy. But it's impossible not to swoon.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Literate, oldfashioned, soul-filling and thoroughly romantic.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: David Lean's 1965 adaptation of Pasternak's romance of the Russian Revolution is intelligent and handsomely mounted, though it doesn't use its length to build to a particularly complex emotional effect.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: One of the most meticulously designed and executed films.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Steiger and Courtenay excepted, all the performances are very uncomfortable.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Mr. Bolt has reduced the vast upheaval of the Russian Revolution to the banalities of a doomed romance.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Lean's last great film.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: Although its portentous historical drama evaporates once you return to the fresh air, watching it can be seductive.
title: Doctor Zhivago

quote: The cast is marvelously filled out with John Heard as Ludie and Carlin Glynn as Jessie Mae As an ensemble it is as fine a cast as one could want.
title: The Trip to Bountiful

quote: The movie surprises us: It's not really about conflict between the generations, but about the impossibility of really understanding that you are even a member of an older generation, that decades have gone by.
title: The Trip to Bountiful

quote: Tender Mercies won Robert Duvall his only Academy Award in six nominations. It contains one of his most understated performances. It's mostly done with his eyes.
title: Tender Mercies

quote: As a TV movie about a highly sensitive subject, overall it's a moving experience.
title: And the Band Played On

quote: And the Band Played On adds its own snare-drum resonance to the AIDS catastrophe, beating elements of Randy Shilts' journalism into a passionate, incisive condemnation of the government's public health policy regarding this epidemic.
title: And the Band Played On

quote: I enjoyed seeing A-list actors in the sort of small supporting role they would never otherwise accept. And they got the film made.
title: And the Band Played On

quote: It's inconceivable that "The 'burbs looked good on paper.
title: The 'burbs

quote: The 'Burbs doesnit quite go the distance, but for most of its length it is a superbly inventive, insightful and funny black comedy.
title: The 'burbs

quote: This movie was directed by Joe Dante, whose style has become increasingly broad and abrasive since he made the clever Gremlins back in 1984.
title: The 'burbs

quote: The script would like to be a horror film, a comedy and a commentary on suburban living, but it doesn't hit any target.
title: The 'burbs

quote: Director Joe Dante funnels his decidedly cracked view of suburban life through dark humour in The 'Burbs.
title: The 'burbs

quote: Characteristically, Dante's nonchalant attitude towards plot structure makes for erratic pacing (the last half hour does flag), but that's part and parcel of his breathless, anarchic style.
title: The 'burbs

quote: The Burbs is a big unfurnished movie about some very small characters living in a suburbia that is consciously designed to look like sit-com land.
title: The 'burbs

quote: A long shaggy dog story.
title: The 'burbs

quote: Although it initially flares up on high-concept firewood, this caper about nasty neighbors and curious klutzes gradually dies down into isolated crackles, sputters and phuts.
title: The 'burbs

quote: Why is it not funny? It's just not. Not remotely, momentarily, intermittently or otherwise funny.
title: The 'burbs

quote: This isn't a major Dante effort, but his ability to make a good-natured satire that allows an audience to read it several ways at once is as strong as ever, and many of the sidelong genre notations are especially funny.
title: The 'burbs

quote: A strange, brooding tale.
title: Il portiere di notte

quote: With a little application and imagination I suppose one might read themes of political and philosophical import into this work, but Cavani's style remains stupidly literal and gaga.
title: Il portiere di notte

title: Il portiere di notte

quote: The movie's visual virtues are negated by infinite absurdities -- particularly by the sentimentality with which the director views this luckless couple.
title: Il portiere di notte

quote: The Night Porter is as nasty as it is lubricious, a despicable attempt to titillate us by exploiting memories of persecution and suffering.
title: Il portiere di notte

quote: Istvan Szabo's Mephisto is brilliant metaphorical filmmaking containing one of the more memorable film-acting performances in recent years.
title: Mephisto

quote: Few have dared what Brandauer accomplishes: showing us a good actor responding to the same neurotic drive for the center of the stage, the immortalizing role. His is a great performance, nothing less.
title: Mephisto

quote: A disappointingly thin, conventional film.
title: Mephisto

quote: Hungaro pic shows extraordinary period flair for the Germany of the 1920s and '30s, balanced acting by a multinational cast, and exemplary direction.
title: Mephisto

quote: A superbly modulated, fruitfully ambivalent central performance by Brandauer carries the emotional and intellectual weight of the political dilemma.
title: Mephisto

quote: The actor is played by Klaus Maria Brandauer in one of the greatest movie performances I've ever seen.
title: Mephisto

quote: Mephisto seems somewhat remote, without all the urgency of which Mr. Szabo has shown himself capable.
title: Mephisto

quote: Love it or hate it, see it you must.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Every viewing yields new insights. A berserko modern classic.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: The film releases a toxic narcosis of fear.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Three decades after its initial release, David Lynch's Blue Velvet has lost none of its power to derange, terrify, and exhilarate.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: The charged erotic atmosphere makes the film something of a hallucination, but Lynch's humor keeps breaking through, too.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Shocking, visionary, rapturously controlled, its images of innocence and a dark, bruising sexuality drop straight into our unconscious where they rest like depth charges.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: [A] powerful, mesmerizing thriller, a masterful exercise in controlling an audience`s attention.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Lush and peculiar Blue Velvet, the latest film from the mind that spawned Eraserhead, is an unnerving combination of the wholesome and the unholy.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Destined to become a cult classic, Blue Velvet presents what is probably the most original cinematic vision to come along this year. Undoubtedly, it will be too strong for many tastes.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Lynch and his film will surely be reviled, but as an experiment in expanding cinema's dramatic and technical vocabulary, Blue Velvet demands respect.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: The film casts its spell in countless odd ways, in the archetype-leaning imagery, eccentric tableau styling, and moth-in-candle-flame attraction to the subconscious twilight.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Blue Velvet is a throughly unpredictable, frequently disturbing and sometimes jaw-droppingly funny film. There isn't anything else quite like it, and it's pretty wonderful.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: The modest proportions of the film are just right for the writer-director's desire to investigate the inexplicable demons that drive people to deviate from expected norms of behavior and thought.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: The seamless blending of beauty and horror is remarkable, the terror very real, and the sheer wealth of imagination virtually unequalled in recent cinema.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Kinkiness is its salient quality, but Blue Velvet has deadpan humor too, as well as a straight-arrow side that makes its eccentricity all the crazier. There's no mistaking the exhilarating fact that it's one of a kind.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Blue Velvet is David Lynch in peak form, and represents (to date) his most accomplished motion picture. It is a work of fascinating scope and power that rivals any of the most subversive films to reach the screens during the '80s.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: [A] finely wrought tale of erotic horror and secret evil.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: It's the only one of Lynch's works to marry his nightmarish concerns to a story that (very nearly) makes sense.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: It made me feel pity for the actors who worked in it and anger at the director for taking liberties with them.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: Not quite like any other thriller or erotic mystery you've ever seen.
title: Blue Velvet

quote: It's a typical animal adventure, stripped of its guts by an enfeebling if commendable effort to shield young viewers from violence and death.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: The real missing element is heart.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: Of course we all know what ''Natty Gann'' is leading up to, but it`s a testament to the landscape and to the freshness of Salenger that getting there is such a joy.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: For the truth is that Natty Gann is a very good movie by anyone's standards.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: How sweet it is for a reviewer to encounter an unheralded film that gladdens the heart and replenishes the soul The Journey of Natty Gann is one of that rare species It is a well nigh perfect film.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: Despite the script's simplicities and some over-lacquered photography from Dick Bush, enough warmth and sincerity remain to make this one of Disney's best family offerings for some time.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: [Jeremy Kagan] keeps the pacing brisk, and if he doesn't make as emotional a picture as someone else might have, The Journey of Natty Gann has a quiet dignity.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: Beautifully photographed and designed, evocatively scored, it's a pleasantly archaic family entertainment in the Disney tradition.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: Director Jeremy Paul Kagan extracts an engaging performance from Meredith Salenger as the heroine.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: There's a real sense of period, even if the film does occasionally become over-sentimental.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: As Wolf, a dog named Jed gives a forthright and believable performance. Miss Salenger, for her part, gives one, too, and she carries the movie nicely.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: It's nice to see a Disney film that follows the rules of the family-film genre as Walt laid them down.
title: The Journey of Natty Gann

quote: Not an unmitigated disaster but the absurd shootout climax pushes it into stock escapist revenge masala fare.
title: Kidnap

quote: The quintessential American love story -- the one between the spoiled heiress and the spontaneous, fun-loving guy from the wrong side of the tracks -- has seldom been more elegantly and entertainingly told.
title: Lady and the Tramp

quote: In The Outsiders, the director's class is consistently present, but it may be a case of the wrong man for the job, since overall film plays unevenly, with a cliche and detached ambiance that robs the plotline of what passion it might've whipped up.

quote: Because it falls in with the undulating rhythm of the life of its heroes, for whom a fatal fight and a quiet night have almost equal importance, the picture never manages to reach the peaks of satisfying Hollywood melodrama.
title: The Outsiders

quote: Well acted and crafted but highly conventional.
title: The Outsiders

quote: The film is unremitting in its morbid sentimentality, running its teenage characters through a masochistic gamut of beatings, killings, burnings, and suicides.
title: The Outsiders

quote: Lightly likeable.
title: The Outsiders

quote: A deeply strange film that gives '60s hoodlums the personalities of Care Bears and places them under constant attack from preppies in pastel sweaters.
title: The Outsiders

quote: [Coppola's] revisions to the film, which include a new, improved soundtrack, invest it with grandeur worthy of both its characters and his own ambitions.
title: The Outsiders

quote: Francis Coppola's revision of his 1983 film of S.E. Hinton's best seller The Outsiders is funny, touching and revelatory.
title: The Outsiders

quote: There's not much life in this movie, or spontaneity. It's a stylistic exercise.
title: The Outsiders

quote: It's as if someone had handed Verdi a copy of ''The Hardy Boys Attend a Rumble'' and, holding a gun to the poor man's head, forced him to use it as a libretto.
title: The Outsiders

quote: Spielberg has come up with another rousing piece of entertainment.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: With the action nonstop there is no time for mere acting, much less for a coherent plot.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: Again you will savor the Indiana Jones schizophrenia: by day a bow-tied, bespectacled archaeologist; by night a resourceful swaggerer, whom Ford brings to life as a modern blend of Bogie and the Duke, with just a glint of misfit psychopathy in his eyes.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: It's not the darker turn that makes The Temple of Doom uncomfortable at times; it's its mean-spiritedness.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: Pic comes on like a sledgehammer, and there's even a taste of vulgarity and senseless excess not apparent in Raiders.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: The film betrays no human impulse higher than that of a ten-year-old boy trying to gross out his baby sister by dangling a dead worm in her face.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: Part of the trouble is that anything clearly does go, including the slender hold on credibility that Raiders managed to maintain.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: The kind of movie where your date is always grabbing your forearm in a viselike grip, as unbearable excitement unfolds on the screen. After the movie is over, you've had a great time but your arm is black-and-blue for a week.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: Too shapeless to be the fun that Raiders is, but shape may be beside the point. Old- time, 15-part movie serials didn't have shape. The just went on and on and on, which is what Indiana Jones does with humor and technical invention.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: There's plenty of rip-roaring action to distract us from the more unpalatable elements.
title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

quote: The sense of closure is exquisite, but I'm not sure I'm able to forgive Peter Jackson for the three years that he has taken to put it on the screen. The wait has been excruciating.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Viggo Mortensen's Aragorn is the good king of the title, and while the actor may look fetching in a crown and cloak, he doesn't have half of the gravitas of Sean Bean's Boromir in the first film.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: With The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King, Peter Jackson delivers a decent ending to his fantasy trilogy -- actually, about 12 endings.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: The Return Of The King ultimately proves up to the series' increasingly difficult task: making movies that echo legends, making legends that reflect life, and reconciling it all with the fact that both legends and lives all eventually meet their ends.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Yes, the running time is long, and yes, those many endings in a slow, dreamy coda left me feeling spent -- better spent than I can ever remember.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Standing out amid an excellent cast is Elijah Wood, stymied by tweeness in the earlier films but here convincingly developing the character of Frodo as the embodiment of valor and self-sacrifice.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: No flabber has been left ungasted by Mr Jackson's mighty battle sequences, nor no gob unsmacked.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Some story strands are crudely abbreviated; others fail to develop elements that were already well-established.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: The New Zealand landscape, as ever, shovels its way into your psyche and the huge battle scenes feel as personal and fraught with tension as domestic dramas.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Pops your eyes, excites your senses and brings you in as close as a whisper for scenes of startling emotion.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: As I watched this film, an eager victim of its boundless will to astound, I found my loyal memories of the book beginning to fade.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Not only has Jackson boldly and faithfully brought J.R.R. Tolkien's world to life, he's created the most epic and sweeping fantasy adventure of all time.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Completes the picture, magnificently so, and all honour and praise are due the visionaries behind the project.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: The thrilling conclusion to what has become the film event of our time -- the definitive screen fantasy -- features more spellbinding moments, bigger battles, more emotion and more poetry than the terrific first two films in the trilogy.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: A movie for our time, perhaps for all time, mostly a good time and definitely a long time.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: It reminds you of the power of film like no other movie in memory.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: I went along with the first and admired the second, but it wasn't until the third that I was swept away by the magnitude of Jackson's vision.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Confirms Jackson's reputation as a kinetic director who has made author J.R.R. Tolkien's work his own -- not as plagiarist but as a visionary.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: Return of the King is such a crowning achievement, such a visionary use of all the tools of special effects, such a pure spectacle, that it can be enjoyed even by those who have not seen the first two films.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: The final chapter completes The Lord of the Rings series in thrilling style -- and restores faith in the idea that popular entertainment can soar to majestic heights.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

quote: This is pulp moviemaking at its worst.
title: Needful Things

quote: Needful Things is yet another one of those films based on a Stephen King story that inspires you to wonder why his stories don't make better films.
title: Needful Things

quote: "Cujo" no doubt presented fewer difficulties for a novelist than it does for a movie director.
title: Cujo

quote: A dull, uneventful entry in the horror genre.
title: Cujo

quote: This adaptation on a modest budget from Stephen King's bestseller about a rabid St Bernard is a pleasing illustration of the filmic simplicity at the heart of King's better writing.
title: Cujo

quote: The family members seem believably typical, which makes their encounter with the demonic dog all the more involving. Be warned: if you find yourself too caught up in ''Cujo,'' you'll have a hard time looking your own pooch in the eye.
title: Cujo

quote: The plot meanders and chases its own tail without ever establishing coherent characters.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: In "All Dogs Go to Heaven," the possible is the mundane.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: ''All Dogs Go to Heaven'' will never be an animated classic, such as ''Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'' or ''Bambi,'' but it is enjoyable entertainment for the entire family.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: The plotting, which is best when kept simple in a film for very young viewers, is so unfocused and overcomplicated that it becomes difficult to follow.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: Reynolds surely has a bone to pick with his woofish alter ego, who has all the actor's swagger but little of his diffident charm.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: Technicolor is back with an improved color system, and in All Dogs Go to Heaven it permits such a voluptuous use of color that the movie is an invigorating bath for the eyes.
title: All Dogs Go to Heaven

quote: They're creepy and they're predictable? Mysterious and rather tame?
title: The Addams Family

quote: An extended collection of one-liners and not much more.
title: The Addams Family

quote: Despite inspired casting and nifty visual trappings, the eagerly awaited Addams Family figures as a major disappointment.
title: The Addams Family

quote: The film's aimlessness and repetitiveness eventually become draining.
title: The Addams Family

quote: At times this can all become a little silly but Sonnenfeld manages to rein the film in before things get too ridiculous.
title: The Addams Family

quote: An otherwise very funny scene featuring Thing amounts to an extended ad for Federal Express, and the rap beats from Hammer's new album boom from passing cars in several scenes -- nothing will date this movie faster.
title: The Addams Family

quote: There are a lot of little smiles in The Addams Family, and many chuckles and grins, but they don't add up to much.
title: The Addams Family

quote: More than merely a sequel of the TV series, the film is a compendium of paterfamilias Charles Addams's macabre drawings, a resurrection of the cartoonist's body of work. For family friends, it would seem a viewing is de rigueur mortis.
title: The Addams Family

quote: Wispy threads of dramatic plausibility and character involvement unravel completely by the time of the incredibly silly final reel.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: Never loses its bearings as it hovers between preposterous paranoia and a Billy-Wilder-like moral fable about a deeply flawed hero who draws a line in the sand beyond which he cannot go.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: The film echoes the technical wizardry and complex plotting of De Palma's best film, Blow Out.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: Director Brian De Palma does his stylish best to weave the patchy script into a cinematic quilt, but despite his best efforts -- and they're often formidable -- the thing just doesn't cohere.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: What might have been fascinating after a while becomes frustrating and, finally, a real slog.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: I can't think of another movie that starts so brilliantly and ends so miserably as this one.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: The last five to 10 minutes are completely stupid and add nothing to the film.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: You're never asked to invest much in the characters, and by the time you've roused yourself to care, it's too late.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: De Palma doesn't know the meaning of the word "subtle" -- every scene in Snake Eyes uses a brash, in-your-face approach that works until the disappointing climax.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: It's the worst kind of bad film: the kind that gets you all worked up and then lets you down, instead of just being lousy from the first shot.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: [De Palma's] most flamboyant fantasy of high-flying conspiracy and corruption since Blow Out.
title: Snake Eyes

quote: Although De Palma doesn't always stick rigorously to each separate viewpoint, there's an undeniable finesse in the way he parcels out the exposition in increments...
title: Snake Eyes

quote: Safe Men whirls wildly from one bright idea to the next, trying to find a combo that will hold the movie together. No luck.
title: Safe Men

quote: [Sarandon is] shirtless before she even has a name, but her desire to be ogled is granted dignity and power; gradually and unassumingly, she upstages a terrific Burt Lancaster.
title: Atlantic City

quote: A shimmering success.
title: Atlantic City

quote: "Atlantic City" is a sophisticated fairy tale, beautifully acted and beautiful to behold; it is as funny as it is touching.
title: Atlantic City

quote: Film is blessed with a spare, intriguing script by Yank John Guare, which always skirts impending cliches and predictability by finding unusual facets in his characters and their actions.
title: Atlantic City

quote: Eclectic, pacy and hard to categorise, it's part crime thriller, part love story, part fairytale, and part a gentle, generous examination of certain dying aspects of American culture.
title: Atlantic City

quote: What makes "Atlantic City" sweet -- and that's the word for it -- is the gentleness with which Lou handles his last chance at amounting to something, and the wisdom with which Sally handles Lou.
title: Atlantic City

quote: [It] may be one of the most romantic and perverse ghost stories ever filmed, set not in a haunted castle but in a haunted city...
title: Atlantic City

quote: [Taylor] is nothing less than brilliant as the shrewish, slovenly. blasphemous, frustrated, slightly wacky, alcoholic wife of a meek, unambitious assistant professor of history at a university, over which her father reigns as president.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: Nichols has actually committed all the classic errors of the sophisticated stage director let loose on the unsophisticated movies. For starters, he has underestimated the power of the spoken word in his search for visual pyrotechnics.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: The greatest credit for the implacable engagement that the film creates for its audience must go to the director, Mike Nichols. Nichols makes a stunning film bow with Virginia Woolf.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: When Nichols finally settles down, it's almost too late.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: Edward Albee's vitriolic stage portrayal of domestic blisslessness translated grainily and effectively to the screen.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: One of the most scathingly honest American films ever made.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: Keen adaptation and handsome production by Ernest Lehman, outstanding direction by Mike Nichols in his feature debut, and four topflight performances score an artistic bullseye.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: 'You have ugly talents,' George says, almost admiringly, to Martha. So does this movie.
title: Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?

quote: Chris sets off on a rescue mission, and ends up running the gauntlet of big city perils in a belaboured spinning-out of a weak storyline.
title: Adventures in Babysitting

quote: A sweet-natured, adolescent variation on the big-city black comedy After Hours.
title: Adventures in Babysitting

quote: By the end of the film, I'd had a couple of real laughs and a few interesting moments, but that was about all.
title: Adventures in Babysitting

quote: The movie is the latest in the "Wouldn't it be neat if . . .?" school of movies.
title: Weird Science

quote: Weird Science veers off into a typical coming-of-age saga without exploring any of the psychological territory it lightly sails over in the early going.
title: Weird Science

quote: This is ordinary stuff that's aged about as well as Mitchell-Smith's clunky computer.
title: Weird Science

quote: Even 14-year-old boys may find it heavy sledding.
title: Weird Science

quote: Weird Science combines two great traditions in popular entertainment: Inflamed male teenage fantasies and Frankenstein's monster.
title: Weird Science

quote: If you can identify all the voices before the credits roll up, you are a better man than I.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: This film does what all children's films should do: not just offer lots of entertaining things to look at, but teach children how to look at the world with curiosity, attentiveness and joy.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: It's hard to go wrong with a cute liddle piggy.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Adult audiences tend to find [Dakota Fanning] rather shrill - witnessing [her] at full shriek is like being attacked by a colony of bats. For this reason, Charlotte's Web is probably one for youngsters only.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: If they'd stopped yammering for just a few minutes, White's heartbreaking ending might have retained its poignancy. As it is, it's little more than a blessed relief.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Youngsters will warm to the barn's talking animals and perhaps even shed a tear at the sight of a spider shuffling off the mortal coil. Arachnaphobes, though, are advised to approach with caution.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Any tears you may shed will be wholly earned.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: I think what's most valuable here is the gentle reminder that lives are short, friendship is priceless and words can make a difference. The movie Charlotte's Web isn't a classic, but the message is.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Woe be to the child who doesn't mist up at this movie, since it's been made if not with zip, wit, or imagination, then at least with sweetness. But I hope no one will think the film is an adequate replacement for White's book. That would be a crime.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: There's too much talent and too strong a story to mess it up. There was potential for more here, but this incarnation is nothing to be ashamed of, and some of the actors answer the bell.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Charlotte's Web has all the requisite elements that a family film needs to succeed and endure: humor, drama, pathos, and an emotionally satisfying ending.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Best of all may be the narration, by Sam Shepard: His voice, the kind of voice God might have if he'd ever smoked Camels, frames this gentle but potent little story with good-natured authority, making it feel modern and ageless at once.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: In the end, the pros and cons all just add up to that same bit of modern-day kid-movie praise: It could have been so much worse.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Charlotte's Web, with its insistently 'magical' theme music, an overbearing climax and a trough full of bad jokes, is merely adequate.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: It's a movie so modest and gentle, you'll hear your neighbour's popcorn crunch. But you may also hear your heart beating. And there's nothing wrong with that.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: The film, directed by Gary Winick (13 Going on 30) has a sweetness of its own.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: Charlotte's Web, a splendid new screen adaptation of White's 1952 children's book, gloriously brings the classic to life. If you've never read it, this is a perfect introduction.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: The movie may not be perfect, but it beautifully distills White's simple message. We are all born to die. But we are also born to befriend.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: "Some pig?" Sure. Some spider. And some book. Some movie, too.
title: Charlotte's Web

quote: A rare movie that keeps kids on the edge of their chairs without inducing in their parents an overwhelming desire to escape theirs for a smoke in the lobby.
title: Watership Down

quote: A brief spark of imagination survives in a prologue sequence, designed by the great John Hubley before he was fired from the film. The rest is blandness.
title: Watership Down

quote: The 'camera' takes a conventionally objective viewpoint, perpetually rolling over rolling countryside, which effectively robs the plot of all its terror and tension.
title: Watership Down

quote: Don Bluth, who led an exodus of animators from Walt Disney Productions three years ago, has produced a feature in the Disney tradition: Full animation, spectacular effects, rounded characters.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: Bluth and his animators, bless them, chose to revive an endangered art form -- classically detailed animation. They drew their characters exquisitely and gave them individual personalities.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: Not enthralling, but worth seeing for anyone interested in the mechanics of this arcane art.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: Every character moves fluidly and imaginatively against an extravaganza of detailed background and dazzling effects, all emboldened by fascinating colored textures.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: It is something gorgeous to look at.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: The animation was, as Bluth and company had promised, a spectacular return to old-school craftsmanship.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: It's a spectacular return to the shimmering, mesmerising deep-focus animation associated with Disney's classic period...
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: It looks good, moves well, and delights our eyes.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: The story manages to be sentimental without being especially moving.
title: The Secret of NIMH

quote: As narrative, the incidents in The Dark Crystal are unremarkable; as the excuse for special effects, fanciful decor and eccentric characters, they do nicely enough.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: Jim Henson and Frank Oz... designed and directed this 1983 film, in which no human actors appear (except as crude long-shot doubles for the animated figures); it's a cute gimmick, but the puppets are so stiff and inexpressive that the film drops dead.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: The story is a standard fairy-tale concoction, but the New Agey philosophy about healing and heroism makes for a classic Henson story, all heart and rapturous wonder at the world's incredible possibilities.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: A children's fantasy film so enjoyable, imaginative and devoid of cuteness that you want to shake the hand of each individual member of the huge team of collaborators.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: The Dark Crystal, besides being a dazzling technological and artistic achievement by a band of talented artists and performers... that could teach a lesson in morality to youngsters at the same time it is entertaining their parents.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: Desiccated, clawing villains feasting on rotting food in a castle as unprepossessing as the crashed spaceship in Alien have a splendour that is almost operatic.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: The screenplay by David Odell, based on a story by Mr. Henson, is without any narrative drive whatever. It's without charm as well as interest.
title: The Dark Crystal

quote: Cartoons with ambitions even this noble are as rare as Steven Spielberg films that lose money, but every character and every situation presented herein have been seen a thousand times before.
title: An American Tail

quote: The overall quality of the animation -- baroquely executed if rather conventionally conceived -- makes it worth a look
title: An American Tail

quote: For all its state-of-the-art animation techniques, Spielberg's production remains resolutely conservative: visually it's virtually indistinguishable from Walt at his wimpiest.
title: An American Tail

quote: Witless if well-meaning.
title: An American Tail

quote: The movie has such vague ethnic grounds, however, that only a few children will understand or care that the Mousekewitzes are Jewish. And few of those are likely to be entertained by such a tragic, gloomy story.
title: An American Tail

quote: A bright-eyed tale of Jewish triumphs that will find a place in many young hearts.
title: An American Tail

quote: It may be that the truly American tale here is the spectacle of an artist squandering his awesome gifts on the way to becoming a Hollywood institution.
title: An American Tail

quote: There is nothing really the matter with An American Tail: Fievel Goes West, except that it is not inspired with an extra spark of imagination in addition to its competent entertainment qualities.
title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West

quote: Watch with compassion.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: There's also a darkly handsome high school heartbreak kid (Michael Schoeffling), a merciful brisk pace, some quick humor (visual and verbal), and a solid music track.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: As the girl, Molly Ringwald is natural and appealing, but she's lost in a world of blunt, vicious caricatures.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: Sly humour and an appreciative ear for the demotic improv of teenage chat completes an attractive package.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: A sweet and funny movie about two of the worst things that can happen to a girl on her sixteenth birthday.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: Most of the the movie is cheerful and light, showcasing Mr. Hughes's knack for remembering all those aspects of middle-class American adolescent behavior that anyone else might want to forget.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: Sixteen Candles is a youth movie that somehow succeeds despite its multiple excesses.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: Some of the material works marvelously well, but the stuff that doesn't takes the movie down with it.
title: Sixteen Candles

quote: Neither author Hughes nor director Howard Deutch can stop the needle getting stuck in a too-familiar groove.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: ... in the end "Pretty in Pink" is as fraudulent as the junk it's supposed to transcend.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: As irresistibly sweet as cotton candy.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: First-Timer Howard Deutch is a nice surprise too. His precise, unexploitative direction is sympathetic to the awkward pauses in teen talk, to the mopery of first love, to the suicidal bravado of words spoken in heat.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: These kids have a bumpy ride, but this is one film that identifies with their passions instead of indulging them, giving us a perfect back-seat view of kids out cruising, not for kicks but for a hard-earned sense of pride.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: It's way too hackneyed for John Hughes. He's already shown us that he knows better.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: When Molly Ringwald and Annie Potts are onscreen together, the movie is aglow. See Pretty In Pink or, years from now, you may suffer side effects from missing it.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: Deutch has no discernible style; the scenes march ahead with only one development per scene, much like the worst in American television.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: Pretty in Pink is a rather intelligent (if not terribly original) look at adolescent insecurities.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: This is like every other Hughes film, just a little shoddier.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: To be able to give this kind of stuff new and sympathetic twists is a tribute to Hughes' skill with narrative, and to Ringwald's magnetism as a performer.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: Miss Ringwald's pouty naturalness remains her biggest asset, and her performance is once again appealing.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: Although it is not a great movie, it contains some moments when the audience is likely to think, yes, being 16 was exactly like that.
title: Pretty in Pink

quote: These aren't characters -- they're character hooks.
title: St. Elmo's Fire

quote: All speed and stylishness without a bit of emotional resonance beneath.
title: St. Elmo's Fire

quote: There is an abundance of astute and knowledgeably drawn scenes with this contextually structured story. There are some biting observations of college life, with law school in particular taking some verbal jabs on the chin.
title: St. Elmo's Fire

quote: St. Elmo's Fire is all about a group of recent college graduates in Washington who were always the best of friends but now are drifting apart as real life approaches, discovering various reasons why they are so individually obnoxious.
title: St. Elmo's Fire

quote: Estevez and Nelson are as unappealing here as in The Breakfast Club, though in fairness they're hampered by a script that seems to despise its characters.

quote: The film is edited so skittishly that the actors are barely able to complete their sentences, let alone their thoughts. That's probably just as well.
title: St. Elmo's Fire

quote: This is Reader's Digest prehistory, though at least director Chapman (cameraman on Raging Bull) makes sure the murky caves look nice.

quote: The filmmakers made no effort to empathize with their prehistoric characters, to imagine what it might have really been like back then.
title: The Clan of the Cave Bear

quote: Film's main virtues are its striking, widescreen visuals of unusual locations, and the sheer educational value of its narration.
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

quote: Offensively racist and too gormless even for the kids at whom it is evidently aimed: Third World cinema of a quite... uncommon kind.
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

quote: This movie's a nice little treasure.
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

quote: The film's initial sequences, in which the simple, no- nonsense manners and mores of the bushmen are shown on the screen accompanied by rather coy voice-over narration, are terribly patronizing.
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

quote: Let your conscience be your guide.
title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

quote: The original film's director, Charles Martin Smith... has been replaced by Richard Martin, who brings a family-hour blandness to every scene.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: [The film is] marked by dumbfoundingly bad dialogue, cliche-driven plotting and groan-worthy predictability.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: As sequels go, Air Bud: Golden Receiver is barking up the wrong tree.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: It's a Styrofoam-cup comedy, lightweight and disposable, but this G-rated fantasy of suburban family life is a good bet for its intended audience of 12-year-olds and younger.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: Air Bud 2: Golden Receiver is a pale shadow of the entertaining 1997 family movie. It's a sequel that lacks the spirit and sweetness of the original.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: Though the movie is inept in a number of key ways, what it really lacks is a lead actor who can carry his scenes with an un-doggish panache.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: The film is pleasantly sweet and occasionally sharp.
title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver

quote: The movie meanders on and on, like a bad sexual dream, until you finally wake up mumbling: Stella, please: leave that groove thang alone.
title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back

title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back

quote: Stella may be frothy and paper-thin, but it's also another great success for star Angela Bassett, who transforms the film into an infomercial for her considerable abilities.
title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back

quote: Ms. Bassett portrays this high-strung superwoman with such intensity that she makes her almost believable.
title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back

quote: Women of all ages and races will undoubtedly cheer Stella on as she wrestles with the dilemma of falling in love with a younger man, and by doing so, gets her groove back ... baby.
title: How Stella Got Her Groove Back

quote: I'm not denying that a 40-year- old woman might be self-conscious about going around with someone this young. But the subject isn't interesting or provocative enough to sustain an entire movie.

quote: I never felt Stella and Winston were on the same wavelength, that they could share their lives, that it would be a good idea for them to try.

quote: The issues that arise from such a May/September male/female pairing are sensitively and intelligently explored.

quote: Consider this the big-screen equivalent of a beach read: Just turn off your brain and wallow in whatever turn-ons -- Whoopi and whoopee -- Stella offers.

quote: All formula gloss, a romance that tackles some difficult issues by missing them altogether.

quote: Funny, well acted comedy from a new director whose career shuld be watched

quote: Though hypocritical in the way it sensationalizes sexuality, this serious and funny 1998 movie about a 15-year-old coming to terms with her body and her family in 1976 is, refreshingly, never coy or ironic.

quote: A small film with plenty of incidental pleasures, writer/director Jenkins' debut feature puts a winning new spin on the adolescent comedy-drama.

quote: There's an alchemy that can transform personal experience into a great film, but it was nowhere nearby when Tamara Jenkins wrote and directed this lacklustre first feature.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: What lifts this brash comedy above the vulgar herd is Tamara Jenkins in a heartfelt feature debut as writer and director.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: The best-written comedy I've seen since The Opposite of Sex.

quote: Coming-of-age films don't get any warmer, funnier, raunchier, or more endearing than Tamara Jenkins's brightly feisty memoir, 'Slums of Beverly Hills'.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: Basically I enjoyed Slums of Beverly Hills -- for the wisecracking, for the family squabbles, for the notion of squatters who stake a claim in a Beverly Hills where money, after all, is not the only currency.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: The character's struggles with the pitfalls of adolescent development may be particular to women, but many of the emotional ramifications will strike a chord of familiarity for men, as well.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: A hilarious comedy that never strains to be funny.
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: All of [the cast members], especially Ms. Lyonne and Mr. Arkin, project a crazy sincerity that turns this personal and nostalgic comedy into a very true story indeed.

quote: Dark, bitingly funny!
title: Slums of Beverly Hills

quote: [Director John McNaughton] shows few of Henry's dozen or so crimes. Instead he reveals the victims, at the scenes of their deaths, in slow zoom shots accompanied by elegiac music. He is a coroner with a touch of the poet.

quote: In a world in which eight nearly identical Friday the 13th movies offer the adventures of Jason the ax-murderer as entertainment for teen-agers, maybe we do need this sobering alternative.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: The film is an honest and disturbing attempt to come to grips with the sort of modern horror that we must -- more urgently every day -- try to understand.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: The difference between John McNaughton's incredibly chilling film and the usual serving of screen carnage is the difference between the mind of a murderer and the cynical and manipulative depiction of mindless murder.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: Sure, it's compelling; the nature of the material guarantees that. But it doesn't seem to be telling us much more than that the world is a scary place and murder is ugly. We knew those things. This is tabloid chic.

quote: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer is as fine a film as it is a brutally disturbing one.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: McNaughton's direction combines a strict social realism with a cool, Fritz Langian sense of pre-determination, while his work with actors has the improvisational freshness of a John Cassavetes.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: Certainly not for everyone, but if slasher movies are your cup of tea this is a lot better than most, and the use of Chicago locations is especially effective.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: McNaughton's compelling study of a blithe sociopath makes the flesh crawl and the mind reel.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: There are still some shocks.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: Mr. McNaughton's observations are so chilling and precise that they gain some artistic stature even when they cross the line that makes the audience voyeurs and accomplices.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: John McNaughton's haunting film is a grim journey into the life of its twisted subject that refuses to moralise or judge.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: This film gives off a dark chill that follows you all the way home.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: A low-budget tour de force that provides an unforgettable portrait of the pathology of a man for whom killing is not a crime but simply a way of passing time and relieving boredom.
title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: The emptiness in Henry seems like an artistic convenience or, worse, an evasion. What we suspect, finally, is that the deficiencies belong more to the artist than to his subject.

title: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer

quote: A very sophisticated, very effective piece of work spun from primal images, with an excellent cast.

quote: A supremely intelligent and convincing adaptation of Ira Levin's Satanist thriller.
title: Rosemary's Baby

quote: It should establish Mia Farrow as an actress of stature and Roman Polanski as a name which will be remembered.

quote: The devil may come in many forms, but few have been more entertaining.

quote: Hunched, black-eyed, leering, John Cassavetes's Guy is a contaminated satanic canal in himself.

quote: This honorable follow-up to LaBute's stunning debut, In the Company of Men, which also dissects sexual politics, is well acted by the entire ensemble.

quote: Bleak, scathing, and utterly compelling!

quote: The film has no shape or narrative force. It merely chronicles events.

quote: Irresistibly entertaining!

quote: In photographing the action, Director Hitchcock brought off a tour de force.

quote: Apart from the tedium of waiting or someone to open that chest and discover the hidden body which the hosts have tucked away for the sake of a thrill, the unpunctuated flow of image becomes quite monotonous.

quote: Flash: There is intelligent life in outer space. More, anyway, than in this amiable footnote of a movie.
A hodge-podge of bits and pieces.
Hyams' sequel to Kubrick's big daddy of sci-fi movies may not have the novelty of 2001: A Space Odyssey, but it is still a better film than anyone could have dared to expect.
A good-looking, sharp-edged, entertaining, exciting space opera.
A lot of care has gone into it, but it has no satirical substructure to match that of the Kubrick film, and which was eventually responsible for that film's continuing popularity.

Now that enough time has elapsed since the release of 2010 for outraged 2001 fans to calm down, it can be seen that, while there was no decisive creative reason for Hyams' sequel to exist, it's not a bad movie.

The build-up to this and the initial moments on board are racked with a tension that's superbly handled by Hyams. He maintains the forbidding atmosphere well and his skills as a cinematographer are evident.
Children of a Lesser God, though given a handsome openness in Director Haines' production, cannot transcend the banalities of the play. But Matlin does. She is, one might say, a miracle worker.

quote: A small picture with a big heart.

quote: Predictable!
title: Jack Frost

title: Rushmore

quote: There's an unshakable confidence about this coming-of-age fable that matches that of its central character, Max Fischer.
title: Rushmore

quote: Rushmore offers more than simply a series of high-grade yuks; it's a finely-judged parable on the line between self-delusion and reality.
title: Rushmore

quote: If happiness is finding something you love to do and doing it forever, one of my somethings might just be watching this oddly uproarious little flick.
title: Rushmore

title: Rushmore

title: Rushmore

title: Rushmore

quote: What I wanted was a larger perspective, something more insightful than the one-thing-after-another existential whimsy.
title: Rushmore

title: Rushmore

quote: A peculiar, poignant comedy, with an outstanding character turn from Murray.
title: Rushmore

quote: This film is so not-from-the-cookie-cutter, so unaccommodating of our expectations, that we can't anticipate where Anderson's going to take us. Every scene is a discovery or sly diversion.

quote: [An] inordinately clever, sprightly romantic comedy.

quote: A ripely emotional comedy-fantasia.
