title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Sexy, sardonic and slightly over the top, it definitely contains Polanski's best work in years.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: It drags, it clunks, it leaves you stuck between a guffaw and a groan.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: You end up feeling duped for taking a two-hour-plus ride that dumps you in the middle of nowhere.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Watching The Ninth Gate is like being force-marched through dank rooms piled high with musty books, led by drab tour guides who mutter the same pedantic points over and over.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Isn't likely to be mistaken for one of Polanski's great shockers.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: About as scary as a sock-puppet re-enactment of The Blair Witch Project, and not nearly as funny.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Polanski's sly sense of film-noir conventions pokes fun at the genre while at the same time honoring it.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Early on I thought I could almost smell the sharp must of the leather bindings ... but that scent was just the aroma of middle-brow, art-house Euro-rot, a whiff of decay and hauteur.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: I kept hoping Polanski would take the plot by the neck and shake life into it, but no.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Compulsively watchable.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Amusing, ultra - deadpan entertainment.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Elegant, scary fun.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: It overstays its welcome by 20 minutes or so, just long enough for us to begin to feel a little silly for having so much fun.
title: The Ninth Gate

quote: Here is a sweet and innocent parable about a boy who could fly -- and about a girl who could fly, too.
title: The Boy Who Could Fly

quote: What makes The Fly such a stunning piece of obsessive film making is the way Cronenberg deftly allows us to identify with his monstrous creation.
title: The Fly

quote: Wildly imaginative, gut-wrenchingly scarifying and profoundly primal (not to mention funny), David Cronenberg's The Fly is a movie that whacks you in the solar plexus and leaves you gasping.
title: The Fly

quote: What's good about the film are the strong performances and the ingenious, mostly amusing script. What's ugly, of course, is the grossness. And what's bad is the movie's inability to reconcile its good and ugly aspects.
title: The Fly

quote: As slimy and as grotesque as some of its special effects become, The Fly is a far superior horror film to the top-grossing film in America of late, Aliens.
title: The Fly

quote: The Fly seizes on our ingrained, instinctive horror of sexuality, the sense of shame that our fundamentally puritanical society can't help but teach us, and by confirming our worst fears, helps us, for a moment, to move beyond them.
title: The Fly

quote: A gross-your-eyes-out horror movie that is also the year's most poignant romance.
title: The Fly

quote: David Cronenberg's remake of the 1958 horror classic The Fly is not for the squeamish. Casting Jeff Goldblum was a good choice as he brings a quirky, common touch to the spacey scientist role.
title: The Fly

quote: The Fly is almost unique for a horror movie in that it compels us sympathize with and root for the characters.
title: The Fly

quote: Image so much subverts intention that Jeff Goldblum's tragic flyperson finally seems more ludicrous than affecting, voyeuristically bizarre.
title: The Fly

quote: The playful, quirky chemistry between Goldblum and Davis in the first half of the movie ensures that this gothic horror is heartbreaking as well as stomach-churning.
title: The Fly

quote: ...a film that tries to be too many things at once -- funny but not campy, sad and scary, a horror story and a human tragedy...
title: The Fly

quote: Firmly rooted in the type of film he does best, Cronenberg unleashes a series of nauseating effects as Goldblum transforms into a fly over a period of weeks.
title: The Fly

quote: With audiences jaded by the usual sex and splatter, do the filmmakers have no qualms about juicing up proceedings with edgy but troubling material which clearly needs more conscientious handling? Apparently not.
title: Running Scared

quote: Presumably patterned after Robert Rodriguez's Sin City, but substantially more graphic, there is surely an audience for this empty brutality, but you would not want to know anyone to whom this picture appeals.

quote: No one in their right minds could call this a good film, but it's certainly unique.

quote: We haven't even mentioned the hockey puck torture scene, or the relentless ricochetting camerawork, or the multiple last minute switcheroos -- it's got more endings than Lord Of The Rings.
title: Running Scared

quote: The end result of all these cross-mob confrontations is an orgy of nihilistic violence that is curiously exhilarating, I am almost ashamed to say.

quote: It says something when the most sympathetic character is a kid who shoots his dad with a stolen pistol.
title: Running Scared

quote: It's ugly and it's vile and it's disgusting and it's creepy and it just got tiresome.
title: Running Scared

quote: Ethnic stereotyping, moral qualms and plot improbabilities aside, you just wish a movie like Running Scared wasn't so anxious to be exciting all the time: It gets so monotonous.
title: Running Scared

quote: There's clearly supposed to be tension between Joey's good and bad sides. Sure, he's a mobster, but he's also a family man, which makes him... gray. (Not black and white = very sophisticated.)
title: Running Scared

quote: In the opening minutes of Running Scared, a drug deal goes bad and takes the entire movie with it.
title: Running Scared

quote: There is a child at the center of this ultraviolent story, and the devices used to keep us on tenterhooks regarding his survival are appallingly manipulative.
title: Running Scared

quote: A ferociously energetic piece of filmmaking, Running Scared makes the seedy Vegas milieu of writer-director Wayne KramerWayne Kramer's first feature, The Cooler, look as tasteful as The Sound of Music.
title: Running Scared

quote: Running Scared is for people who like movies, who don't need to have a movie mean something in order to enjoy it and who can delight at the sheer craft of a story designed only to shock, amuse and hold an audience.

quote: It's borderline irresponsible, a virtual horror movie of a gangster thriller.

quote: Kramer seems to be aping Quentin Tarantino's brilliant tangents in Pulp Fiction, but he doesn't have Tarantino's imagination or gift for dialogue.

quote: This overlong fantasy of urban violence is so far over the top -- you might as well be watching a computer monitor while somebody else has a high time playing the video game Grand Theft Auto.
title: Running Scared

quote: Running Scared is a vicious and brutal B-movie jacked up to hysterical, hallucinatory proportions -- a pulpy, violent action picture that torments the viewer as much as its characters, and I mean that as a compliment.

quote: As the movie becomes more howlingly ludicrous by the second, it's tempting -- and not in a cynical way, either -- to start reading it as a parody of pornographic video game violence.

quote: This exercise in inanity opens today at the U. A. Twin and other theaters.

quote: An initially promising, but quickly disappointing retread of Tobe Hooper and Kim Henkel's hugely influential horror classic.

quote: 'Inspired by a true story' presumably adds to the sordid thrills; maybe we should look forward to entertainments about Nazis torturing children.

quote: Here's a slice of advice: Go to the video store and rent the original.

quote: It's horrible and explicitly violent, but never authentically scary.

quote: It's a gory, stylish, and occasionally scary push-button factory of shocks and shrieks remarkably better than anyone had the right to expect.

quote: ... a bloody good time of a B-movie.

quote: An overproduced, video-director remake, slick and grue-marinated and loud as a sonic boom.
title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre

quote: Weakens, dilutes, disinfects and otherwise undermines the legacy of Tobe Hooper's 1974 original.
title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre

quote: Next to this redundant, pointless and witless retread, the classic status of Tobe Hooper's original version is officially beyond dispute.
title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre

quote: Mainly it's a vapid, vicious thrill ride that washes away immediately.
title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre

quote: Unlike movies such as Seven, there isn't enough style in the new The Texas Chainsaw Massacre to justify the bloodbath, and it's riddled with too much been-there-done-that to endure as a classic.

quote: The new Massacre lowers the bar much the way the original 'dead teenager' horror flick did way back in 1974, and makes a mockery of that industry self-policing rubber stamp known as the ratings board.

quote: Does convey the sense of being caught in a nightmare. A stupid person's nightmare.

quote: A splatterfest remake that relentlessly assaults the senses and mind with no discernable redeeming social value.

quote: Just as humorless as the original, but it's also slicker, glossier and resoundingly artificial.

quote: Gruesome enough; what it lacks is a distinctive revolting personality of its own.

quote: For those who saw the first two Massacres, this will seem pretty much deja-boo!

quote: Much of the fun of this comedy is in watching what happens as virtually everyone in the movie tries to double-cross or otherwise take advantage of everyone else.

quote: An undemanding but well-executed entertainment.
title: Ruthless People

quote: Ruthless People contains some of the biggest laughs of 1986.

quote: It's a rare kind of craftsmanship, and it produces a rare kind of pleasure.

quote: A pity that the directors prove less ruthless than their own creations, but there is more than enough here for people who enjoy murder attempts on cute pet poodles.

quote: Miss Turner's self-assured comic timing goes a long way toward salvaging the film, providing both moral and physical dimension to a role that scarcely exists.

quote: It's a wistful fantasy, a bright reminiscence, a Stroll down memory lane that's as glowingly conceived as it is slightly flawed.
title: Peggy Sue Got Married

quote: This time Coppola apparently simply wanted to make a movie, and put some characters on the screen, and tell a story. He has, all right. This is one of the best movies of the year.

quote: Though this is clearly Newman's picture, Tom Cruise also is a joy to watch.

quote: We are not on Rocky's side of the street, but in Martin Scorsese country, where bent character, not sentiment, shapes destiny, and the best the struggling human spirit can hope for is a split decision.

quote: Pic has a distinctive pulse of its own with exceptional performances by Paul Newman and Tom Cruise.

quote: A solidly crafted entertainment that, for the most part, strikes a successful balance between commercial necessity and personal expression.

quote: There are really only two good words to say about this wreck -- Melody Anderson.

quote: A Freudian script of notable maturity teases limitless implications from this premise, while maintaining a healthy sense of humour.

quote: An audacious, clinical, and ruthlessly frank thriller.

title: A River Runs Through It

quote: Redford's movie is too little show and too much tell.
title: A River Runs Through It

quote: This has the feel of something genuine: sweet, touching, and sentimental.
title: A River Runs Through It

quote: In its determination to emphasize character and thoughtful content over formulas and facile sensationalism, it's a movie that's proudly out of step with Hollywood trends.
title: A River Runs Through It

quote: Redford and his writer, Richard Friedenberg, understand that most of the events in any life are accidential or arbitrary, especially the crucial ones, and we can exercise little conscious control over our destinies.
title: A River Runs Through It

quote: It doesn't hurt matters that the story's set in one of the world's most beautiful corners -- rendered in pre-twilight glows by cinematographer Philippe Rousselot.
title: A River Runs Through It

quote: Under the direction of Adrian Lyne, most of the picture's situations seem like randomly chosen place holders, flat events that just fill time until the final bizarre confrontation.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: [The film brings] horror home to a place where the grownup moviegoer actually lives.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: The screws are tightened expertly in this suspenseful meller about a flipped-out femme who makes life hell for the married man who scorns her.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: While billed as a romance and a thriller, the film strictly qualifies as neither, appealing to our prurience, guilt, hatred, and dread.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: A predictable dog's dinner of Pavlovian thriller clichés, this will appeal strongly to those who think women should be kept on a short lead.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: Years hence, it will be possible to pinpoint the exact moment that produced Fatal Attraction, Adrian Lyne's new romantic thriller, and the precise circumstances that made it a hit.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: Fatal Attraction has an inescapable pull to it; it's suffocatingly exciting.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: Because the good things in the movie -- including the performances -- are so very good, it's a shame that the film's potential for greatness was so blatantly compromised.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: Close should take pride in her performance. She should also expect a depressing avalanche of scripts requiring a she-wacko.
title: Fatal Attraction

quote: The biggest fault of Jagged Edge is that whatever suspense it manages to generate in its climactic scenes is achieved artificially, through tricky editing and manipulative ''danger'' music.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: A well-crafted, hardboiled mystery.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: The wholesome cast completely obliterates the unstated perversities that have been this genre's reason for being.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: These days it is almost unheard of for a movie to keep you guessing until the last frame, but this one does, partly because Marquand plays it so beautifully straight.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: The screenplay, by Joe Eszterhas, does what it can to throw up a smokescreen, but the audience will probably be well ahead of the story's final resolution.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: Like many entries into the genre, Jagged Edge works best when it's watched with a minimum of analysis.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: Supremely effective.
title: Jagged Edge

quote: The interplay between the two leads is pure gold.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Who said movies always have to be original? This one is redeemed by execution and brilliant talent: De Niro, Grodin, director Martin Brest, composer Danny Elfman, most of the cast and technicians.
title: Midnight Run

quote: A performance like De Niro's, in a well-made entertainment like Midnight Run, is cheap at any price. And capable of restoring the audience's faith in the form.
title: Midnight Run

quote: De Niro is nervily hilarious and Grodin nervelessly exceptional in Midnight Run, a formula buddy movie exalted to insta-classic status by their performances.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Grodin and De Niro are different kinds of actors, but they share a knack for detail and a gift for understatement that keeps their scenes together crackling.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Midnight Run touches on one of the great mysteries of the movies: How is it that the tritest material can come to life when touched by the right director and the right actors?
title: Midnight Run

quote: Funny, unpredictable and refreshingly adult.
title: Midnight Run

quote: The result is one of the most entertaining, best executed, original road pictures ever.
title: Midnight Run

quote: That old formula, handcuffed captor and captive who become buddies on the run, gets an injection of new life from the playing of the cast.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Mr. De Niro and Mr. Grodin are lunatic delights, which is somewhat more than can be said for the movie, whose mechanics keep getting in the way of the performances.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Whoever cast De Niro and Grodin must have had a sixth sense for the chemistry they would have; they work together so smoothly, and with such an evident sense of fun, that even their silences are intriguing.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Much as he might try, Brest can't masquerade this mainstream Hollywood studio picture as an offbeat little character piece.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Brest propels the drama forward with planes, trains and automobiles (helicopters, too), but also makes time for De Niro, Grodin, and an excellent supporting cast, to make the frenetic ride well worth the trip.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Miraculously, De Niro and Grodin turn this sow's ear into a plausible vehicle for a buddy movie, and thanks to both of them, this movie springs to life.
title: Midnight Run

quote: Williams gives his best "straight" performance, shorn of all his marvelous manic vaudeville. The man he plays here is not a performer, which he was even in Dead Poets Society, but simply a man.
title: Awakenings

quote: Though Parker's heart, and his facts, are in the right place, he's succeeded in reducing a powerful story of institutional racism into an unforgivably dull film.
title: Come See the Paradise

quote: Come See the Paradise is a fable to remind us of how easily we can surrender our liberties, and how much we need them.
title: Come See the Paradise

quote: Backdraft truly shows us fire the way we've never seen it before.
title: Backdraft

quote: "Backdraft" is a spectacle worth observing; it may also generate a little more respect for firemen, everyday heroes who don`t need the movies to polish their image.
title: Backdraft

quote: Backdraft has some of the raw filmmaking excitement that has been missing from Howard's recent work.
title: Backdraft

quote: Visually, pic often is exhilarating, but it's shapeless and dragged down by corny, melodramatic characters and situations.
title: Backdraft

quote: Visually speaking, the film does pretty well with fire-as-spectacle, less well with everything else (Howard tends to trot out fuzzy-toned Spielbergian backlighting on any pretext).
title: Backdraft

quote: The fire sequences are stunning, and the build-up to them, complete with blaring sirens and bellowed conversations, has an aggressive immediacy.
title: Backdraft

quote: The spectacular fire sequences, which must have been hellish to film, are powerfully enveloping on screen, thanks especially to the eerie effect of the title.
title: Backdraft

quote: Director Howard is so mesmerized by the flames, he squirts formulaic lighter fluid over everything.
title: Backdraft

quote: Backdraft is sure to do for fire what The Poseidon Adventure did for water.
title: Backdraft

quote: [The scenes involving fire] are so good they make me recommend the movie anyway, despite its brain-damaged screenplay.
title: Backdraft

quote: The search for the Holy Grail reaches peak insanity in this wild, redemptive ride through two men's interconnected lives.
title: The Fisher King

quote: Visually impressive, frequently pretentious, and extremely fluid as narrative (the 137 minutes sail by effortlessly), this mythic comedy-drama presents Gilliam as half seer, half snake-oil salesman and defies you to sort out which is which.
title: The Fisher King

quote: The Fisher King has two actors at the top of their form, and a compelling, well-directed and well-produced story.
title: The Fisher King

quote: Working within the constraints of a big studio film has brought out Gilliam's best: he's become a true storyteller and a wonderful director of actors. This time he delights not only the eye but the soul.
title: The Fisher King

quote: Scary, touching, often hilarious, this modern fairytale is surprisingly enchanting.
title: The Fisher King

quote: For every wild ride through Manhattan by an imaginary Red Knight trailing billows of flame, there is a small, comic encounter in a more down-to-earth mode.
title: The Fisher King

quote: So what if it's not perfect? It's magic.
title: The Fisher King

quote: The Fisher King is a disorganized, rambling and eccentric movie that contains some moments of truth, some moments of humor, and many moments of digression.
title: The Fisher King

quote: A modern epic that fuses myth with hard-edged reality, it's a one-of-a-kind, thoroughly engaging experience.
title: The Fisher King

quote: Frozen River is a taut, suspenseful thriller; a troubling of borders both cultural and national; and testament to the virtues of communion, empathy and compassion.
title: Frozen River

quote: Occasionally marred by contrivance and a crude internal logic that doesn't bear close scrutiny, 'Frozen River' works best as a knuckle-gnawing, blue-collar genre thriller.
title: Frozen River

quote: Leo and Upham give performances of great conviction and the film is bold and uncliched: especially the matter-of-fact treatment of guns.
title: Frozen River

quote: It's Leo, with her pained and battered magnetism - half-pleading, half screw-you - who shakes the film out of its occasional glibness, notching up the performance of her career in thrilling, hungry style.
title: Frozen River

quote: Everything about the film looks and feels authentic, from the desolate landscape dotted with trailers and fast-food joints to the people who populate a borderland that offers none of them much hope.
title: Frozen River

quote: Early scenes have a raddled power. Later ones slip into a Chistmastide slush of contrivance and redemption.
title: Frozen River

quote: A modest but thrilling drama.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frozen River represents one of the best examples of the new trend for austerity and social realism in American indie cinema.
title: Frozen River

quote: Hunt's grip on the impulsive fumblings of real-life behaviour is so firm that you stay with her all the way, almost forgetting to breathe. It's a simple story but a primal one, and it gives Leo the role she's long deserved.
title: Frozen River

quote: Despite a few contrived plot turns and some heavy handed symbolism, this first feature from writer-director Courtney Hunt can be recommended as a thriller, as a tearjerker, and as a regional study.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frozen River let me forget I was watching a movie, something that didn't happen often in 2008.
title: Frozen River

quote: There are moments of poetry on display.
title: Frozen River

quote: It moves and it heals, finding hints of redemption in the jagged face of life.
title: Frozen River

quote: The miracle of filmmaker Courtney Hunt's tense, carefully understated debut is that it is made better by its few flights of fancy.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frozen River isn't just a good movie made by a woman; it's a good movie on anyone's terms, one of the year's best. To find hope beneath this ice, in this ugly terrain, is to dream big.
title: Frozen River

quote: Made with uncommon skill and assurance, the film never succumbs to rank sentimentality, but it manages to get at the nuances of human relationships.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frozen River, a story of abject desperation, feels so real and immediate that it plays almost like a documentary.
title: Frozen River

quote: We quickly sense that the director of this film has unusual perception, and that whatever the story and performances turn out to be, she will make the most of them.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frozen River does what too many independent American movies only pretend to do: Takes you to an unnoticed corner of our country and shows what it's like to actually live there.
title: Frozen River

quote: Frances McDormand, as the lone female union rep, and Richard Jenkins, as Josie's angry miner dad, cut through the predictability.
title: North Country

quote: You cannot help being stirred by the reach and depth, the constant rebuffs to sloppiness, of a strong ensemble.
title: North Country

quote: Though the dirt and grime in North Country are artfully applied, it's purely cosmetic and skin-deep.
title: North Country

quote: North Country does a good job in ratcheting up the tension and unfairness until the audience is brought to the breaking point.
title: North Country

quote: If there was ever any thought that perhaps Whale Rider was a fluke, North Country should erase all doubt.
title: North Country

quote: North Country delivers an emotional wallop and a couple of performances worthy of recognition come award time.
title: North Country

quote: She's [Caro] got a good story to tell (based, loosely, on a real-life case), and a marvelous cast to help her tell it.
title: North Country

quote: What gives North Country urgency is that it's about how a man comes to understand that it's bad for him and for his community to deny his daughter privileges and prerogatives he'd grant his son.
title: North Country

quote: Niki Caro, director of Whale Rider, has made a classic underdog-vs.-the-system story, rendered in the harsh blue-grays of a Minnesota winter.
title: North Country

title: North Country

quote: In the end, the no-nonsense direction by Caro (the New Zealander who directed Whale Rider), the terrific actors and the pitiless visuals by the great Menges more than carry the day.
title: North Country

quote: It's a memorable and touching portrayal of a certain kind of woman who is vital and determined instead of neurotic and victimized.
title: North Country

quote: North Country may be a simplistic account of a hard-won battle, but it will have audiences cheering.
title: North Country

quote: Despite its serious subject matter, North Country is a crowd-pleaser at heart.
title: North Country

quote: There's nothing cool or dispassionate anywhere in this film. It radiates waves of heat.
title: North Country

quote: For all North Country's blockbuster elements, the film remains a curiously uninvolving affair.
title: North Country

quote: In overdoing the theatrics and hammering the clichs North Country does artistic injustice to its own important argument.
title: North Country

title: North Country

quote: If you can take North Country as a movie, not a news report, you'll find a moving work that explores sexual harassment with unusual candor.
title: North Country

quote: North Country is a relentlessly discomforting movie. Nowhere does it let you settle into the lush cushions of a typical Hollywood entertainment
title: North Country

quote: You must simply accept the flood of emotion and let it wash over you, because the tears are jerked by performances that are informed by intelligence and taste as well as emotional honesty.
title: Places in the Heart

title: Places in the Heart

quote: This is Benton back to his best -- the writer of Bonnie and Clyde and director of Bod Company, who finds the beating heart of his country in the countryside.
title: Places in the Heart

quote: For all its ingratiating certainties about human values, this rural drama has been pieced together with evident skill and care.
title: Places in the Heart

quote: [Places in the Heart is] sweet, though not saccharine. If the sense of place is very strong here, it's because four generations of Bentons have lived in the town where the story happens and the movie was filmed.

quote: Places in the Heart is a loving, reflective homage to his hometown by writer-director Robert Benton.
title: Places in the Heart

quote: Much is unemphatic, but all of it carries the moving weight of conviction. And it ends on a healing grace-note which passeth all understanding.

quote: [Benton's] memories provide the material for a wonderful movie, and he has made it, but unfortunately he hasn't stopped at that. He has gone on to include too much.
title: Places in the Heart

quote: Robert Benton spends most of this film signaling his intentions to make a noble, stirring piece of dust-bowl Americana on the model of a Ford or Vidor, yet the goods he delivers are wholly synthetic.
title: Places in the Heart

quote: Based on Marsha Norman's Pulitzer Prize-winning drama, it's almost a textbook example of how not to bring Broadway to the screen.
title: 'night, Mother

quote: Arnie's not taking any chances this time, and the result is the most questionably repulsive big-budget film in recent memory.

quote: Drab and depressing.
title: End of Days

quote: This is of interest only to the hard core of Schwarzenegger's army.

quote: As incoherent about its mysticism as it is about anything else.

quote: The movie is frequently silly.

quote: Politically astute, visually breathtaking but emotionally inert.

quote: The film is less than the sum of its parts.

quote: Unengaging!

quote: From a technical perspective, Ride With the Devil is nearly perfect.

quote: Oddly distant and uninvolving for such a blazing subject.

quote: Ang Lee is amazing.

quote: Tumbleweeds impresses with its freshly considered action and total avoidance of the stale and routine.

quote: Guaranteed to be mistaken for a first-rate picture.

title: A Map of the World
